Item.Name: ID
Item.Hint: Id number; press LIST or Count Query Hits for name/id search; Duplicate Item for Alternate ID look-up.

Trigger.Name: POST-CHANGE
Trigger.TriggerText:
-- 70-0159. Validate person ID
DECLARE
lv_confid_ind VARCHAR2(30) := NULL;
lv_dcsd_ind VARCHAR2(30) := NULL;
BEGIN 
G$_VALID_ID(:KEY_BLOCK.ID, :KEY_BLOCK.PIDM, :KEY_BLOCK.NAME, lv_confid_ind, lv_dcsd_ind, 'NNNY');
G$_CHECK_FAILURE;
END; 
DECLARE
 PTI_INTO_TEMP VARCHAR2(255);
 CURSOR first_name_c IS
 SELECT SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME
 FROM SPRIDEN
 WHERE SPRIDEN_ID = :KEY_BLOCK.ID
 AND SPRIDEN_CHANGE_IND IS NULL
 AND SPRIDEN_ENTITY_IND = 'P' ;
 
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM SPBPERS
 WHERE SPBPERS_PIDM = :KEY_BLOCK.PIDM
 AND SPBPERS_SSN IS NOT NULL
 AND SPBPERS_BIRTH_DATE IS NOT NULL
-- ginaw cnmccwr #4116 8/30/10 ** AND SPBPERS_ETHN_CODE IS NOT NULL ** removed ethn codes changed
 AND SPBPERS_SEX IN ('M', 'F') ;
BEGIN
 :KEY_BLOCK.FIRST_NAME := '';
 OPEN first_name_c ;
 FETCH first_name_c INTO :KEY_BLOCK.FIRST_NAME ;
 CLOSE first_name_c;
 
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO PTI_INTO_TEMP ;
--
 IF (PTI_CURSOR%NOTFOUND) OR (:KEY_BLOCK.FIRST_NAME IS NULL) THEN
 MESSAGE( G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0078', 'FORM','*ERROR* First Name, SSN, Birth Date, Sex Code or Ethnic Code incomplete.') 
 
 );
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 END IF ;
END ;
--
if :global.location_ind = 'C' or :global.empr_ind <> 'H' then
 goto check_address;
end if;
 DECLARE
 PTI_INTO_TEMP VARCHAR2(255);
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM SPBPERS
 WHERE SPBPERS_PIDM = :KEY_BLOCK.PIDM
 AND SPBPERS_CITZ_CODE IS NOT NULL;
BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO PTI_INTO_TEMP ;
--
 IF (PTI_CURSOR%NOTFOUND) THEN
message( G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0079', 'FORM','*ERROR* Citizen Code must be entered on PPAIDEN') );
raise form_trigger_failure;
 END IF ;
END ;
--
 <<CHECK_ADDRESS>>
DECLARE
 PTI_INTO_TEMP VARCHAR2(255);
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM SPRADDR
 WHERE SPRADDR_PIDM = :KEY_BLOCK.PIDM ;
BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO PTI_INTO_TEMP ;
 IF PTI_CURSOR%NOTFOUND THEN 
 MESSAGE( G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0080', 'FORM','*ERROR* No address information exists.') );
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 END IF ;
END ;

Item.Name: PEBEMPL_EMPL_STATUS
Item.Hint: Employee Status;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-LIST-CHANGED
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :PEBEMPL_EMPL_STATUS IN ('L', 'B', 'P', 'F') THEN
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER('MNU_OPT_WIN_LOA') ;
ELSIF :PEBEMPL_EMPL_STATUS = 'T' THEN
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER('MNU_OPT_WIN_TERM') ;
END IF ;
--
IF (:OLD_EMPL_STATUS = 'T') AND (:PEBEMPL_EMPL_STATUS = 'A') THEN
 DECLARE
 V_ALERT_BUTTON NUMBER;
 BEGIN
 V_ALERT_BUTTON := SHOW_ALERT('TERMINATE_ALERT') ;
 IF V_ALERT_BUTTON = ALERT_BUTTON1 THEN
 :PEBEMPL_TREA_CODE := '';
 :PEBEMPL_TERM_DATE := '';
 ELSE
 :PEBEMPL_EMPL_STATUS := 'T' ;
 END IF ;
 END ;
END IF ;
--
IF :PEBEMPL.PEBEMPL_EMPL_STATUS = 'T'
AND (NVL(:OLD_EMPL_STATUS, '*') != 'T') 
AND :PEBEMPL.PEBEMPL_EW2_CONSENT_IND = 'Y'
AND :REVOKE_EW2_CONSENT_IND = 'Y' THEN 
 :PEBEMPL.PEBEMPL_EW2_CONSENT_IND := 'N';
 :PEBEMPL.PEBEMPL_EW2_CONSENT_USER_ID := :GLOBAL.USER_ID;
 :PEBEMPL.PEBEMPL_EW2_CONSENT_DATE := SYSDATE;
END IF; 
--
:OLD_EMPL_STATUS := :PEBEMPL_EMPL_STATUS ;

Item.Name: PEBEMPL_ECLS_CODE
Item.Hint: Employee Class; press LIST for valid codes.

Trigger.Name: POST-CHANGE
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN
 G$_CHECK_QUERY_MODE ;
IF pokcode.f_code_exists_ind ('PTRECLS',:PEBEMPL_ECLS_CODE) = 'N' THEN
 MESSAGE(pb_employee_strings.f_get_string('INVALID_ECLS_CODE'));
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
END IF;
:ECLS_DESC := pokcode.f_code_desc ('PTRECLS',:PEBEMPL_ECLS_CODE,'PTRECLS_LONG_DESC');
pekempl.p_get_ecls_defaults (
 :PEBEMPL_ECLS_CODE,
 :PEBEMPL_LCAT_CODE,
 :PEBEMPL_BCAT_CODE,
 :PEBEMPL_STGR_CODE,
 :PEBEMPL_WKPR_CODE,
 :PEBEMPL_FLSA_IND,
 :PEBEMPL_EGRP_CODE,
 :PEBEMPL_INTERNAL_FT_PT_IND);
--
 :EGRP_DESC := '';
 :LCAT_DESC := '';
 :BCAT_DESC := '';
--
 :EGRP_DESC := pb_PTVEGRP.f_get_description (:PEBEMPL_EGRP_CODE);
--
 :LCAT_DESC := pb_ptvlcat.f_get_description (:PEBEMPL_LCAT_CODE);
--
 :BCAT_DESC := pokcode.f_code_desc ('PTRBCAT',:PEBEMPL_BCAT_CODE);
--
 IF :PEBEMPL.PEBEMPL_WKPR_CODE IS NULL THEN
 :PEBEMPL.WKPR_DESC := '' ;
 GOTO DEFAULT_STGR_CODE ;
 END IF ;
--
 :WKPR_DESC := pokcode.f_code_desc ('PTRWKPR',:PEBEMPL_WKPR_CODE);
--
 << DEFAULT_STGR_CODE >>
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'CHECK_STAT_CANADA_GROUP' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
--
 :GLOBAL.QUERY_MODE := '0' ;
EXCEPTION
 WHEN FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE THEN
 :GLOBAL.QUERY_MODE := '0' ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE ;
END ;

Trigger.Name: POST-CHANGE
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN
 G$_CHECK_QUERY_MODE ;
--
 IF ( :GLOBAL.QUERY_MODE = '1' ) THEN
 GOTO PTI_STEP_001 ;
 END IF ;
 DECLARE
 PTI_INTO_TEMP VARCHAR2(255);
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM PTRECLC
 WHERE PTRECLC_CODE = :PEBEMPL_ECLS_CODE
 AND PTRECLC_LCAT_CODE = :PEBEMPL_LCAT_CODE ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO PTI_INTO_TEMP ;
 IF PTI_CURSOR%NOTFOUND THEN
 CLOSE PTI_CURSOR ;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'INVALID_CODE_MSG' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;
 CLOSE PTI_CURSOR ;
 END ;
--
 << PTI_STEP_001 >>
 IF pb_ptvlcat.f_code_exists (:PEBEMPL_LCAT_CODE) = 'N' THEN
 MESSAGE(pb_employee_strings.f_get_string( 'INVALID_LCAT_CODE'));
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF; 
 :LCAT_DESC := pb_ptvlcat.f_get_description (:PEBEMPL_LCAT_CODE);
-- 
 << PTI_END_TRIGGER >>
 :GLOBAL.QUERY_MODE := '0' ;
EXCEPTION
 WHEN FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE THEN
 :GLOBAL.QUERY_MODE := '0' ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE ;
END ;

Trigger.Name: G$_SEARCH_PARAMETERS
Trigger.TriggerText:
G$_SEARCH.PARAMETERS('ptrecbc_bcat_code','ptrbcat_desc',
 'where ptrecbc_bcat_code = ptrbcat_code and
 ptrecbc_code = :pebempl_ecls_code');

Trigger.Name: POST-CHANGE
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN
 G$_CHECK_QUERY_MODE ;
--
 IF ( :GLOBAL.QUERY_MODE = '1' ) THEN
 GOTO PTI_STEP_001 ;
 END IF ;
 DECLARE
 PTI_INTO_TEMP VARCHAR2(255);
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM PTRECBC
 WHERE PTRECBC_CODE = :PEBEMPL_ECLS_CODE
 AND PTRECBC_BCAT_CODE = :PEBEMPL_BCAT_CODE ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO PTI_INTO_TEMP ;
 IF PTI_CURSOR%NOTFOUND THEN
 GOTO invalid_code ;
 END IF ;
 END ;
--
 << PTI_STEP_001 >>
 IF :PEAEMPL_FIRST_TIME IS NULL THEN
 :PEAEMPL_FIRST_TIME := 'N' ;
 GOTO GET_BCAT_DESC ;
 END IF ;
--
 IF ( :GLOBAL.QUERY_MODE = '1' ) THEN
 GOTO deduct_error ;
 END IF ;
 DECLARE
 PTI_INTO_TEMP VARCHAR2(255);
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM PDRBDED Y, PDRDEDN Z
 WHERE Y.PDRBDED_PIDM = :KEY_BLOCK.PIDM
 AND Z.PDRDEDN_PIDM = Y.PDRBDED_PIDM
 AND Z.PDRDEDN_BDCA_CODE = Y.PDRBDED_BDCA_CODE
 AND Y.PDRBDED_BDCA_CODE NOT IN (
 SELECT W.PTRBCDN_BDCA_CODE
 FROM PTRBCDN W
 WHERE W.PTRBCDN_BCAT_CODE =
 :PEBEMPL_BCAT_CODE
 AND W.PTRBCDN_BDCA_CODE =
 Y.PDRBDED_BDCA_CODE )
 AND (NVL(Y.PDRBDED_END_DATE, SYSDATE) >= SYSDATE
 AND Z.PDRDEDN_STATUS <> 'T'
 AND Z.PDRDEDN_EFFECTIVE_DATE = (
 SELECT MAX(X.PDRDEDN_EFFECTIVE_DATE)
 FROM PDRDEDN X
 WHERE X.PDRDEDN_PIDM = Y.PDRBDED_PIDM
 AND X.PDRDEDN_BDCA_CODE =
 Y.PDRBDED_BDCA_CODE
 AND X.PDRDEDN_EFFECTIVE_DATE <= SYSDATE )
 OR (NVL(Y.PDRBDED_END_DATE, SYSDATE) >= SYSDATE
 AND Z.PDRDEDN_EFFECTIVE_DATE >= SYSDATE)) ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO PTI_INTO_TEMP ;
 IF PTI_CURSOR%NOTFOUND THEN
 GOTO get_bcat_desc ;
 END IF ;
 END ;
--
 << deduct_error >>
 MESSAGE (
 G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0154', 'FORM','Previous deductions invalid for the new Benefit Cat. must be terminated') 
 ) ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE ;
--
 << get_bcat_desc >> 
 /*IF SELECT_PTRBCAT_3 THEN
 GOTO invalid_code ;
 END IF ;*/
 IF pokcode.f_code_exists_ind ('PTRBCAT',:PEBEMPL_BCAT_CODE) = 'N' THEN
 GOTO invalid_code ;
 END IF;
 :BCAT_DESC := pokcode.f_code_desc ('PTRBCAT',:PEBEMPL_BCAT_CODE);
 GOTO PTI_END_TRIGGER ;
--
 << invalid_code >>
 MESSAGE( G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0155', 'FORM','*ERROR* Ineligible Benefit Category for Employee Class;Press LIST for Eligible categories') );
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;

 << PTI_END_TRIGGER >>
 :GLOBAL.QUERY_MODE := '0' ;
EXCEPTION
 WHEN FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE THEN
 :GLOBAL.QUERY_MODE := '0' ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE ;
END ;

Trigger.Name: KEY-LISTVAL
Trigger.TriggerText:
POPULATE_PTQECBC_RG('PEBEMPL_ECLS_CODE') ;
G$_DISPLAY_LOV('PEBEMPL_BCAT_CODE','') ;

 NULL ;
 ELSE

 END IF ;
 END IF ;

Trigger.Name: POST-CHANGE
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN
 G$_CHECK_QUERY_MODE ;
--
 IF ( :GLOBAL.QUERY_MODE = '1' ) THEN
 GOTO PTI_STEP_001 ;
 END IF ;
--
 G$_CHECK_VALUE ((:PEBEMPL_LREA_CODE IS NOT NULL
 AND :PEBEMPL_LOA_BEG_DATE IS NOT NULL
 AND :PEBEMPL_LOA_END_DATE IS NULL),
 G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0175', 'FORM','*ERROR* Leave of Absence End Date must be entered for this employee.') 
 , TRUE, TRUE);
--
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'COUNT_JOBS' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
--
 << PTI_STEP_001 >>
 IF pokcode.f_code_exists_ind ('PTRTREA',:PEBEMPL_TREA_CODE) = 'N' THEN
 MESSAGE(pb_employee_strings.f_get_string('INVALID_TREA_CODE'));
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF;
 :TREA_DESC := pokcode.f_code_desc ('PTRTREA',:PEBEMPL_TREA_CODE);
--
 IF ( :GLOBAL.QUERY_MODE = '1' ) THEN
 GOTO PTI_END_TRIGGER ;
 END IF ;
 IF (:PEBEMPL_TERM_DATE IS NULL) THEN
 :PEBEMPL_TERM_DATE := SYSDATE ;
 END IF ;
--
 << PTI_END_TRIGGER >>
 :GLOBAL.QUERY_MODE := '0' ;
EXCEPTION
 WHEN FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE THEN
 :GLOBAL.QUERY_MODE := '0' ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE ;
END ;

Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :SYSTEM.FORM_STATUS <> 'CHANGED' THEN
 RETURN ;
 END IF;
--

 :TREA_DESC := '';
 IF :PEBEMPL_TERM_DATE IS NOT NULL THEN
 :PEBEMPL_TERM_DATE := '';
 END IF;
 END IF;

 :PEBEMPL_I9_EXPIRE_DATE := '' ;
 END IF ;

 GOTO USA ;
 END IF ;

 END IF ;
--
 IF ( :GLOBAL.QUERY_MODE = '1' ) THEN
 GOTO PTI_STEP_001 ;
 END IF ;
--
 << PTI_STEP_001 >>
 IF ( :GLOBAL.QUERY_MODE = '1' ) THEN
 GOTO PTI_STEP_002 ;
 END IF ;
 IF SELECT_PTRINST_1 THEN
 GOTO PTI_STEP_002 ;
 END IF ;
--
 << PTI_STEP_002 >>
 IF ( :GLOBAL.QUERY_MODE = '1' ) THEN
 GOTO PTI_END_TRIGGER ;
 END IF ;
 G$_CHECK_VALUE (NOT (:PEBEMPL_I9_DATE <=
 :PEBEMPL_I9_EXPIRE_DATE
 OR :PEBEMPL_I9_EXPIRE_DATE IS NULL),
 G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0183', 'FORM','*ERROR* I9 Date must be prior to I9 Expire Date.') ,
 TRUE, TRUE);
--
 << PTI_END_TRIGGER >>
 :GLOBAL.QUERY_MODE := '0' ;
EXCEPTION
 WHEN FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE THEN
 :GLOBAL.QUERY_MODE := '0' ;
 G$_DATE_WHEN_NEW_ITEM ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE ;
END ;

Trigger.Name: POST-CHANGE
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN

--

 GOTO PTI_END_TRIGGER ;
 END IF ;

 GOTO NEXT ;
 END IF ;

--

 GOTO PTI_END_TRIGGER ;
 END IF ;
 G$_CHECK_VALUE ((:PEBEMPL_I9_DATE > :PEBEMPL_I9_EXPIRE_DATE),
 G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0184', 'FORM','*ERROR* I9 Expiration Date must be later than or equal to I9 Date.') ,
 TRUE, TRUE);
--
 << PTI_END_TRIGGER >>
 :GLOBAL.QUERY_MODE := '0' ;
EXCEPTION
 WHEN FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE THEN
 :GLOBAL.QUERY_MODE := '0' ;
 G$_DATE_WHEN_NEW_ITEM ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE ;
END ;

Trigger.Name: PRE-INSERT
Trigger.TriggerText:
-- Check if using electronic approvals and record has been changed prior -- to insert.
--
 IF :GLOBAL.APPLY= 'Y' AND :GLOBAL.ERROR_OCCURED = 'Y' THEN
 MESSAGE ( G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0081', 'FORM','*ERROR* Record cannot be changed and inserted since it was already approved for the PAF being applied.') );
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF;

 IF (:EFFECTIVE_DATE IS NULL) THEN
 :EFFECTIVE_DATE := SYSDATE ;
 ELSE
 GOTO INSERT_HISTORY ;
 END IF ;
--
 << INSERT_HISTORY >>

 IF :PEBEMPL_EMPL_STATUS = 'T' THEN
 IF :PEBEMPL_TERM_DATE IS NULL THEN
 MESSAGE (
 G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0082', 'FORM','*ERROR* Termination Date Must Be Entered When Employee Status is T.') ) ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;
 END IF;

--
 CHECK_TRANSACTION_UPDATE ('PEBEMPL', :TRANSACTION_NO);
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE;

Trigger.Name: PRE-UPDATE
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
 IF (:EFFECTIVE_DATE IS NULL) OR :PEBEMPL_TERM_DATE != SYSDATE THEN
 :EFFECTIVE_DATE := SYSDATE;
 ELSE
 GOTO INSERT_HISTORY ;
 END IF ;
--
 << INSERT_HISTORY >>

 DECLARE
 PTI_INTO_TEMP VARCHAR2(255);
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM PEBEMPL
 WHERE (PEBEMPL_BCAT_CODE <> :PEBEMPL_BCAT_CODE
 OR NVL(PEBEMPL_LREA_CODE, TO_CHAR(0)) <>
 :PEBEMPL_LREA_CODE
 OR NVL(PEBEMPL_TREA_CODE, TO_CHAR(0)) <>
 :PEBEMPL_TREA_CODE)
 AND PEBEMPL_PIDM = :PEBEMPL_PIDM ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO PTI_INTO_TEMP ;
 IF PTI_CURSOR%NOTFOUND THEN
 GOTO trigger_exit ;
 END IF ;
 END ;
--
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'COBRA_MSG' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
--
 << TRIGGER_EXIT >>
--
 CHECK_TRANSACTION_UPDATE ('PEBEMPL', :TRANSACTION_NO);
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE;

Trigger.Name: POST-UPDATE
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :PEBEMPL_LOA_BEG_DATE IS NULL THEN
 IF :PEBEMPL_TERM_DATE IS NULL THEN
 RETURN ;
 END IF ;
 END IF ;
--
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'CHECK_JOBS' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;

Trigger.Name: KEY-COMMIT
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :DELETE_MODE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN
 GOTO COMMIT_STEP ;
ELSIF :DELETE_MODE_FLAG IS NULL THEN
 NULL ;
END IF ;
--
EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'CHECK_NULL' ) ;
G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'CHECK_NULL2' ) ;
G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
--
<< COMMIT_STEP >>
COMMIT_FORM ;
G$_CHECK_STATUS_QUERY ;
:DELETE_MODE_FLAG := '' ;

Trigger.TriggerText:
EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'INVALID_FUNCTION_MSG' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;

Trigger.Name: KEY-DELREC
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 PTI_INTO_TEMP VARCHAR2(255);
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM NBRBJOB
 WHERE NBRBJOB_PIDM = :PEBEMPL_PIDM ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO PTI_INTO_TEMP ;
 G$_CHECK_VALUE (PTI_CURSOR%FOUND,
 G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0083', 'FORM','*ERROR* Deletion not allowed. This employee has jobs (NBAJOBS form).') ,
 TRUE);
 END ;
--
 DECLARE
 PTI_INTO_TEMP VARCHAR2(255);
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM PDRBDED
 WHERE PDRBDED_PIDM = :PEBEMPL_PIDM ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO PTI_INTO_TEMP ;
 G$_CHECK_VALUE (PTI_CURSOR%FOUND, G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0084', 'FORM','*ERROR* Deletion not allowed. This employee has deductions (PDADEDN form).') 
 
 , TRUE);
 END ;
--
 DECLARE
 PTI_INTO_TEMP VARCHAR2(255);
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM GXRDIRD
 WHERE GXRDIRD_PIDM = :PEBEMPL_PIDM ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO PTI_INTO_TEMP ;
 G$_CHECK_VALUE (PTI_CURSOR%FOUND, G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0085', 'FORM','*ERROR* Deletion not allowed. This employee has direct deposits (GXADIRD).') 
 
 , TRUE);
 END ;
--
 GO_BLOCK( 'PEBEMPL' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_VALUE (NOT FORM_SUCCESS, '*DELREC STEP FAILED*', TRUE);
 DELETE_RECORD ;
 G$_CHECK_VALUE (NOT FORM_SUCCESS, '*DELREC STEP FAILED*', TRUE);
 :DELETE_MODE_FLAG := 'Y' ;

Trigger.Name: KEY-NXTBLK

*/

Trigger.Name: ADJUST_DATES
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF (:GLOBAL.QUERY_MODE = '1') THEN
 RETURN;
END IF;
IF NOT f_employee_exists(:pebempl_pidm) THEN
 :pebempl_first_hire_date := :pebempl_current_hire_date;
 :pebempl_adj_service_date := :pebempl_current_hire_date;
 :pebempl_seniority_date := :pebempl_current_hire_date;
 :pebempl_first_work_date := :pebempl_current_hire_date;
END IF;

Trigger.Name: CHECK_GOVT_IND
Trigger.TriggerText:
:PEBEMPL_STGR_DESC := '' ;
--
 IF ( :GLOBAL.QUERY_MODE = '1' ) THEN
 GOTO PTI_STEP_001 ;
 END IF ;
 IF SELECT_PTRINST_9 THEN
 RETURN ;
 END IF ;
--
 << PTI_STEP_001 >>
 IF ( :GLOBAL.QUERY_MODE = '1' ) THEN
 RETURN ;
 END IF ;
 DECLARE
 PTI_INTO_TEMP VARCHAR2(255);
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM GUBINST
 WHERE GUBINST_HIGHED_GOVT_IND = 'G'
 AND GUBINST_KEY = 'INST' ;
 BEGIN

 END ;

Trigger.Name: CHECK_I9
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :PEBEMPL_I9_FORM_IND = 'N' THEN
 RETURN ;
 ELSIF :PEBEMPL_I9_FORM_IND = 'R' THEN
 GOTO DEFAULT_DATE ;
 ELSIF :PEBEMPL_I9_FORM_IND = 'T' THEN
 RETURN ;
 ELSIF :PEBEMPL_I9_FORM_IND = 'E' THEN
 RETURN ;
 ELSE
 MESSAGE ( G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0090', 'FORM','*ERROR* I9 Form Indicator;(R)eceived,(N)ot Received,(T)emporary,(E)xempt') 
 ) ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;
--
 << default_date >>
 IF :PEBEMPL_I9_DATE IS NULL THEN
 :PEBEMPL_I9_DATE := TO_DATE(:CURRENT_DATE,G$_DATE.GET_NLS_DATE_FORMAT) ;
 END IF ;

Trigger.Name: CHECK_JOBS
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 PTI_INTO_TEMP VARCHAR2(255);
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM NBRJOBS
 WHERE NBRJOBS_PIDM = :PEBEMPL_PIDM ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO PTI_INTO_TEMP ;
 IF PTI_CURSOR%NOTFOUND THEN
 MESSAGE( G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0092', 'FORM','*Note!* No jobs exist for this employee.') ) ;
 RETURN ;
 END IF ;
 END ;

Trigger.Name: CHECK_LCAT
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF NOT f_employee_exists(:pebempl.pebempl_pidm) THEN
 MESSAGE(G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0093', 'FORM', '*ERROR* Must Enter and Save employee record to continue.'));
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
END IF;
--
DECLARE
 lv_temp VARCHAR2(1);
 CURSOR pti_cursor IS
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM pebempl
 WHERE pebempl_pidm = :pebempl.pebempl_pidm
 AND pebempl_lcat_code <> :pebempl.pebempl_lcat_code;
BEGIN
 OPEN pti_cursor;
 FETCH pti_cursor INTO lv_temp;
 IF pti_cursor%FOUND THEN 
 CLOSE pti_cursor;
 MESSAGE(G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0094', 'FORM','*ERROR* Leave Category entered; press Save before leaving block.'));
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF;
 CLOSE pti_cursor;
END;

Trigger.Name: CHECK_LEAVE_END_DATE
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 PTI_INTO_TEMP VARCHAR2(255);
 loa_end_date1 number(20);
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT 'X'
FROM nbrbjob,
 nbrjobs X
 WHERE NBRBJOB_PIDM = :PEBEMPL_PIDM
and nbrbjob_pidm = nbrjobs_pidm
and nbrbjob_posn = nbrjobs_posn
and nbrbjob_suff = nbrjobs_suff
and (nbrbjob_end_date is null or
 nbrbjob_end_date > to_date(loa_end_date1,'J'))
AND NBRJOBS_STATUS IN ('L', 'B', 'P', 'F')
AND nbrjobs_pers_chg_date =
 (SELECT MAX(nbrjobs_pers_chg_date)
 FROM nbrjobs
 WHERE nbrjobs_pidm = X.nbrjobs_pidm
 AND nbrjobs_posn = X.nbrjobs_posn
 AND nbrjobs_suff = X.nbrjobs_suff
 AND nbrjobs_pers_chg_date <= to_date(loa_end_date1,'J'));
 BEGIN
loa_end_date1 := to_number(to_char(:pebempl_loa_end_date,'J')) + 1;
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO PTI_INTO_TEMP ;
 G$_CHECK_VALUE (PTI_CURSOR%FOUND,
 G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0095', 'FORM','*ERROR* Job(s) Exist with leave status on or after Leave End Date Entered') ,
 TRUE);
 END ;

Trigger.Name: CHECK_NULL
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :GLOBAL.FINSYS = 'Y' THEN
 IF :PEBEMPL_COAS_CODE_HOME IS NULL THEN
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'INVALID_COAS_NULL' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 ELSIF :GLOBAL.APPLY <> 'Y' THEN
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'EDIT_COAS_HOME' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;
 ELSE
 IF :PEBEMPL_COAS_CODE_HOME IS NOT NULL THEN
 :PEBEMPL_COAS_CODE_HOME := '' ;
 MESSAGE ( G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0096', 'FORM','Chart of Accounts is valid only if BANNER Finance exists. Nulling Field.') 
 ) ;
 END IF ;
 END IF ;

Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :GLOBAL.FINSYS = 'Y' THEN
 IF :PEBEMPL_COAS_CODE_DIST IS NULL THEN
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'INVALID_COAS_NULL' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 ELSIF :GLOBAL.APPLY <> 'Y' THEN
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'EDIT_COAS_DIST' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;
 ELSE
 IF :PEBEMPL_COAS_CODE_DIST IS NOT NULL THEN
 :PEBEMPL_COAS_CODE_DIST := '' ;
 MESSAGE ( G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0097', 'FORM','Chart of Accounts is valid only if BANNER Finance exists. Nulling Field.') 
 ) ;
 END IF ;
 END IF ;

Trigger.Name: CHECK_STAT_CANADA_GROUP
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :PEBEMPL_STGR_CODE IS NULL THEN
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'CHECK_GOVT_IND' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 RETURN ;
 END IF ;
--
 IF pb_PTVSTGR.f_code_exists (:PEBEMPL_STGR_CODE) = 'N' THEN
 MESSAGE(pb_employee_strings.f_get_string( 'INVALID_STGR_CODE'));
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF; 
 :PEBEMPL_STGR_DESC := pb_PTVSTGR.f_get_description (:PEBEMPL_STGR_CODE);
 --'*ERROR* Stats Canada Grouping Code; Press LIST for valid codes.'

Trigger.Name: CHECK_TERM
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :PEBEMPL_TREA_CODE IS NULL THEN
 IF :PEBEMPL_TERM_DATE IS NULL THEN
 RETURN ;
 ELSE
 GOTO TERMINATION_ERROR ;
 END IF ;
 ELSE
 IF :PEBEMPL_TERM_DATE IS NULL THEN
 GOTO TERMINATION_ERROR ;
 ELSE
 RETURN ;
 END IF ;
 END IF ;
--
 << TERMINATION_ERROR >>
 MESSAGE( G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0098', 'FORM','*ERROR* Termination information is incomplete.') )
 ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE ;

Trigger.Name: COBRA_MSG
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :PEBEMPL_LREA_CODE IS NULL THEN
 GOTO CHK_TERM ;
 ELSE
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'LREA_COBRA' ) ;
 END IF ;
--
 << CHK_TERM >>
 IF :PEBEMPL_TREA_CODE IS NULL THEN
 RETURN ;
 ELSE
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'TREA_COBRA' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;

Trigger.Name: COUNT_JOBS
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF ( :GLOBAL.QUERY_MODE = '1' ) THEN
 RETURN ;
 END IF ;
 DECLARE
 PTI_INTO_TEMP VARCHAR2(255);
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM NBRBJOB
 WHERE NBRBJOB_PIDM = :PEBEMPL_PIDM
 AND NBRBJOB_END_DATE IS NULL ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO PTI_INTO_TEMP ;
 G$_CHECK_VALUE (PTI_CURSOR%FOUND,
 G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0099', 'FORM','*ERROR* Cannot be terminated. All jobs have to be ended.') , TRUE);
 END ;

Trigger.Name: EDIT_TERM_DATE
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF ( :GLOBAL.QUERY_MODE = '1' ) THEN
 RETURN ;
 END IF ;
--
 IF :PEBEMPL_TERM_DATE < :PEBEMPL_CURRENT_HIRE_DATE THEN
 MESSAGE('*ERROR* Termination Date has to be >= Current Hire Service Date.');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 ELSIF :PEBEMPL_TERM_DATE < :PEBEMPL_FIRST_HIRE_DATE THEN
 MESSAGE( G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0101', 'FORM','*ERROR* Termination Date must be greater than or equal to Original Hire Service Date.') );
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 ELSIF :PEBEMPL_TERM_DATE < :PEBEMPL_ADJ_SERVICE_DATE THEN
 MESSAGE( G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0102', 'FORM','*ERROR* Termination Date must be greater than or equal to Adjusted Service Date.') );
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 ELSIF :PEBEMPL_TERM_DATE < :PEBEMPL_SENIORITY_DATE THEN
 MESSAGE( G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0103', 'FORM','*ERROR* Termination Date must be greater than or equal to Seniority Service Date.') );
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 ELSIF :PEBEMPL_TERM_DATE < :PEBEMPL_FIRST_WORK_DATE THEN
 MESSAGE( G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0104', 'FORM','*ERROR* Termination Date must be greater than or equal to First Work Day Service Date.') );
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 ELSIF :PEBEMPL_TERM_DATE < :PEBEMPL_LAST_WORK_DATE THEN
 MESSAGE( G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0105', 'FORM','*ERROR* Termination Date must be greater than or equal to Last Work Day Service Date.') );
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 ELSIF :PEBEMPL_TERM_DATE < :PEBEMPL_LOA_END_DATE THEN
 MESSAGE( G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0106', 'FORM','*ERROR* Termination Date must be greater than or equal to Leave End Date.') );
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE; 
 ELSIF :PEBEMPL_TERM_DATE < :PEBEMPL_LOA_END_DATE THEN
 MESSAGE( G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0107', 'FORM','*ERROR* Termination Date must be greater than or equal to Leave End Date.') );
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE; 
 END IF; 
--

 DECLARE
 PTI_INTO_TEMP VARCHAR2(255);
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM nbrbjob, nbrjobs
 WHERE nbrbjob_pidm = :pebempl_pidm
 AND nbrjobs_pidm = :pebempl_pidm
 AND nbrbjob_posn = nbrjobs_posn
 AND nbrbjob_suff = nbrjobs_suff
 AND nbrjobs_status = 'T'
 AND nbrjobs_effective_date = nbrbjob_end_date
 AND nbrjobs_pers_chg_date > :pebempl_term_date;
 
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO PTI_INTO_TEMP ;
 G$_CHECK_VALUE (PTI_CURSOR%FOUND,
 G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0108', 'FORM','*ERROR* Termination Date must be greater than or equal to Jobs End Date.') ,
 TRUE);
 END ;

Trigger.Name: EMPL_1042
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :PEBEMPL_1042_RECIPIENT_CD IS NULL THEN

ELSIF :PEBEMPL_1042_RECIPIENT_CD = '01' THEN

ELSIF :PEBEMPL_1042_RECIPIENT_CD = '02' THEN
 RETURN ;
ELSIF :PEBEMPL_1042_RECIPIENT_CD = '03' THEN

ELSIF :PEBEMPL_1042_RECIPIENT_CD = '04' THEN
 RETURN ;
ELSIF :PEBEMPL_1042_RECIPIENT_CD = '05' THEN
 RETURN ;
ELSIF :PEBEMPL_1042_RECIPIENT_CD = '06' THEN
 RETURN ;
ELSIF :PEBEMPL_1042_RECIPIENT_CD = '07' THEN

ELSIF :PEBEMPL_1042_RECIPIENT_CD = '08' THEN

ELSIF :PEBEMPL_1042_RECIPIENT_CD = '09' THEN

ELSIF :PEBEMPL_1042_RECIPIENT_CD = '20' THEN

ELSE
 MESSAGE(
 G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0120', 'FORM','*ERROR* 1042 Recipient Code; Access dynamic help for valid values.') ) ;

END IF ;

Trigger.Name: GET_STGR_CODE
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF ( :GLOBAL.QUERY_MODE = '1' ) THEN

 END IF ;
 IF SELECT_PTRINST_9 THEN
 RETURN ;
 END IF ;

Trigger.Name: LREA_COBRA
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 PTI_INTO_TEMP VARCHAR2(255);
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM PTRLREA
 WHERE PTRLREA_CODE = :PEBEMPL_LREA_CODE
 AND PTRLREA_COBRA_ELIG_IND = 'Y' ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO PTI_INTO_TEMP ;
 IF PTI_CURSOR%NOTFOUND THEN
 RETURN ;
 END IF ;
 END ;

Trigger.Name: TERMINATE_REC
Trigger.Comment:
The "Terminate_Rec" trigger checks to see whether an employee has been termi
nated. If so, record may not be updated.
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 PTI_INTO_TEMP VARCHAR2(255);
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM PEBEMPL
 WHERE (PEBEMPL_EMPL_STATUS <> 'T'
 AND pebempl_pidm = :pebempl_pidm)
 OR (pebempl_pidm = :pebempl_pidm
 
/* AND PEBEMPL_ORGN_CODE_HOME = :PEBEMPL_ORGN_CODE_HOME
 AND PEBEMPL_ORGN_CODE_DIST = :PEBEMPL_ORGN_CODE_DIST
 AND NVL(pebempl_coas_code_home, '*') = NVL(
 :pebempl_coas_code_home, '*')
 AND NVL(pebempl_coas_code_dist, '*') = NVL(
 :pebempl_coas_code_dist, '*') */
 
 AND PEBEMPL_ECLS_CODE = :PEBEMPL_ECLS_CODE
 AND PEBEMPL_LCAT_CODE = :PEBEMPL_LCAT_CODE
 AND PEBEMPL_BCAT_CODE = :PEBEMPL_BCAT_CODE
 AND PEBEMPL_FIRST_HIRE_DATE =
 :PEBEMPL_FIRST_HIRE_DATE
 AND PEBEMPL_CURRENT_HIRE_DATE =
 :PEBEMPL_CURRENT_HIRE_DATE
 AND PEBEMPL_ADJ_SERVICE_DATE =
 :PEBEMPL_ADJ_SERVICE_DATE
 AND PEBEMPL_SENIORITY_DATE = :PEBEMPL_SENIORITY_DATE
 AND NVL(PEBEMPL_LREA_CODE, '*') = NVL(
 :PEBEMPL_LREA_CODE, '*')
 AND NVL(PEBEMPL_LOA_BEG_DATE, TO_DATE(G$_DATE.NORMALISE_GREG_DATE('01-01-4712', 'DD-MM-YYYY'),
 G$_DATE.GET_NLS_DATE_FORMAT)) = NVL(:PEBEMPL_LOA_BEG_DATE,
 TO_DATE(G$_DATE.NORMALISE_GREG_DATE('01-01-4712', 'DD-MM-YYYY'), G$_DATE.GET_NLS_DATE_FORMAT))
 AND NVL(PEBEMPL_LOA_END_DATE, TO_DATE(G$_DATE.NORMALISE_GREG_DATE('01-01-4712', 'DD-MM-YYYY'),
 G$_DATE.GET_NLS_DATE_FORMAT)) = NVL(:PEBEMPL_LOA_END_DATE,
 TO_DATE(G$_DATE.NORMALISE_GREG_DATE('01-01-4712', 'DD-MM-YYYY'), G$_DATE.GET_NLS_DATE_FORMAT))
 AND NVL(PEBEMPL_I9_FORM_IND, '*') = NVL(
 :PEBEMPL_I9_FORM_IND, '*')
 AND NVL(PEBEMPL_I9_DATE, TO_DATE(G$_DATE.NORMALISE_GREG_DATE('01-01-4712', 'DD-MM-YYYY'),
 G$_DATE.GET_NLS_DATE_FORMAT)) = NVL(:PEBEMPL_I9_DATE, TO_DATE(
 G$_DATE.NORMALISE_GREG_DATE('01-01-4712', 'DD-MM-YYYY'), G$_DATE.GET_NLS_DATE_FORMAT))
 AND NVL(PEBEMPL_I9_EXPIRE_DATE, TO_DATE(
 G$_DATE.NORMALISE_GREG_DATE('01-01-4712', 'DD-MM-YYYY'), G$_DATE.GET_NLS_DATE_FORMAT)) = NVL(
 :PEBEMPL_I9_EXPIRE_DATE, TO_DATE(G$_DATE.NORMALISE_GREG_DATE('01-01-4712', 'DD-MM-YYYY'),
 G$_DATE.GET_NLS_DATE_FORMAT))
 AND PEBEMPL_EMPL_STATUS = 'T') ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO PTI_INTO_TEMP ;
 G$_CHECK_VALUE (PTI_CURSOR%NOTFOUND,
 G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0139', 'FORM','*ERROR* Employee has been terminated! No update allowed.') , TRUE);
 END ;

Trigger.Name: ON-ERROR
Trigger.TriggerText:
G$_ERRORS.POPULATE_VARIABLES;
IF DBMS_ERROR_CODE = G$_ERRORS.CHECK_POLICY_VIOLATION THEN
 Message(G$_ERRORS.CHECK_POLICY_MESSAGE);
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
ELSIF :TRANSACTION_NO IS NOT NULL AND :HOLD_APTY_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN
 IF ERROR_CODE = 40200 AND ERROR_TYPE = 'FRM' THEN
 MESSAGE ( G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0143', 'FORM','*ERROR* Item cannot be updated since it was already approved for the PAF being applied.') );
 ELSE
 MESSAGE(ERROR_TYPE||'-'||TO_CHAR(ERROR_CODE)||': '||ERROR_TEXT);
 END IF;
ELSE
 MESSAGE(ERROR_TYPE||'-'||TO_CHAR(ERROR_CODE)||': '||ERROR_TEXT);
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
END IF;

Trigger.Name: ON-POPULATE-DETAILS
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation declare section
--
DECLARE
 recstat VARCHAR2(20) := :System.record_status; 
 startitm VARCHAR2(61) := :System.cursor_item; 
 rel_id Relation;
--
-- End default relation declare section
--
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 IF ( recstat = 'NEW' or recstat = 'INSERT' ) THEN 
 RETURN;
 END IF;
 --
 -- Begin PZBEMPL detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:PEBEMPL.PEBEMPL_PIDM is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('PEBEMPL.PEBEMPL_PZBEMPL'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'PZBEMPL'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End PZBEMPL detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin PEVJOBS detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:PEBEMPL.PEBEMPL_PIDM is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('PEBEMPL.PEBEMPL_PEVJOBS'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'PEVJOBS'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End PEVJOBS detail program section
 --

 IF ( :System.cursor_item <> startitm ) THEN 
 Go_Item(startitm); 
 Check_Package_Failure; 
 END IF;
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--

Trigger.Name: ON-CHECK-DELETE-MASTER
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation declare section
--
DECLARE
 Dummy_Define CHAR(1);
 --
 -- Begin PZBEMPL detail declare section
 --
 CURSOR PZBEMPL_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM PZBEMPL P 
 WHERE P.PZBEMPL_PIDM = :PEBEMPL.PEBEMPL_PIDM;
 --
 -- End PZBEMPL detail declare section
 --
 --
 -- Begin PEVJOBS detail declare section
 --
 CURSOR PEVJOBS_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM pevjobs p 
 WHERE p.PEVJOBS_PIDM = :PEBEMPL.PEBEMPL_PIDM;
 --
 -- End PEVJOBS detail declare section
 --
--
-- End default relation declare section
--
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 --
 -- Begin PZBEMPL detail program section
 --
 OPEN PZBEMPL_cur; 
 FETCH PZBEMPL_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF ( PZBEMPL_cur%found ) THEN 
 Message('Cannot delete master record when matching detail records exist.'); 
 CLOSE PZBEMPL_cur; 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF;
 CLOSE PZBEMPL_cur;
 --
 -- End PZBEMPL detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin PEVJOBS detail program section
 --
 OPEN PEVJOBS_cur; 
 FETCH PEVJOBS_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF ( PEVJOBS_cur%found ) THEN 
 Message('Cannot delete master record when matching detail records exist.'); 
 CLOSE PEVJOBS_cur; 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF;
 CLOSE PEVJOBS_cur;
 --
 -- End PEVJOBS detail program section
 --
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--

ProgramUnit.Name: SET_PAF_FIELD
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE SET_PAF_FIELD (TRANS_NO IN NUMBER, APTY_CODE IN VARCHAR2, MODE_FLAG IN VARCHAR2) IS 
 CURSOR CHECK_TRAN IS
 SELECT 'X' 
 FROM NORTRAN
 WHERE NORTRAN_AUFM_CODE = 'PEAEMPL'
 AND NORTRAN_AUBK_CODE = :SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK
 AND NORTRAN_AUFD_CODE = SUBSTR(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_FIELD,9)
 AND NORTRAN_TRANSACTION_NO = TRANS_NO
 AND NORTRAN_APTY_CODE = APTY_CODE;

 DUMMY VARCHAR2(1);
BEGIN 
 IF MODE_FLAG = 'NEW_ITEM' THEN 
 IF TRANS_NO IS NOT NULL AND APTY_CODE IS NOT NULL AND 
 GET_ITEM_PROPERTY (:SYSTEM.CURSOR_ITEM,UPDATEABLE) = 'TRUE' THEN
 OPEN CHECK_TRAN;
 FETCH CHECK_TRAN INTO DUMMY;
 IF CHECK_TRAN%FOUND THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY (:SYSTEM.CURSOR_ITEM, UPDATEABLE, PROPERTY_OFF);
 :PAF_FIELD_OFF := 'Y';
 END IF;
 CLOSE CHECK_TRAN;
 END IF;
 ELSIF MODE_FLAG = 'POST_ITEM' AND :PAF_FIELD_OFF = 'Y' THEN 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY (:SYSTEM.CURSOR_ITEM, UPDATEABLE, PROPERTY_ON);
 :PAF_FIELD_OFF := 'N';
 END IF;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: CHECK_TRANSACTION_UPDATE
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE CHECK_TRANSACTION_UPDATE (BLOCK_NAME IN VARCHAR2, TRANS_NO IN NUMBER) IS

 FIELD_NAME VARCHAR2(30);
 NEW_VALUE VARCHAR2(60);
 FIELD_DESC VARCHAR2(20);
 APTY_CODE VARCHAR2(6);
 FIELD_FORMAT VARCHAR2(1);
 UPDATE_NOBTRAN VARCHAR2(1):='';

 CURSOR GET_NORTRAN_REC IS
 SELECT NORTRAN_AUFD_CODE, NORTRAN_VALUE, NTRAUFD_FORMAT_IND, NTRAUFD_DESC
 FROM NTRAUFD, NORTRAN
 WHERE NORTRAN_TRANSACTION_NO = TRANS_NO
 AND NORTRAN_APTY_CODE = APTY_CODE
 AND NORTRAN_AUFM_CODE = :SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM
 AND NORTRAN_AUBK_CODE = BLOCK_NAME
 AND NTRAUFD_CODE = NORTRAN_AUFD_CODE
 AND NTRAUFD_AUBK_CODE = NORTRAN_AUBK_CODE
 AND NTRAUFD_AUFM_CODE = NORTRAN_AUFM_CODE;


BEGIN
 APTY_CODE := NAME_IN (SUBSTR(BLOCK_NAME,4)||'_APPROVALS_APTY');
 IF APTY_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN
 BEGIN

 UPDATE NORTRAN
 SET NORTRAN_APPLY_STATUS_IND = 'A'
 WHERE NORTRAN_TRANSACTION_NO = TRANS_NO
 AND NORTRAN_APTY_CODE = APTY_CODE
 AND NORTRAN_AUFM_CODE = :SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM
 AND NORTRAN_AUBK_CODE = BLOCK_NAME
 AND NORTRAN_APPLY_STATUS_IND = 'P';

 IF SQL%FOUND THEN 
 UPDATE_NOBTRAN := 'Y';
 END IF;

 IF UPDATE_NOBTRAN = 'Y' THEN 
 UPDATE NOBTRAN
 SET NOBTRAN_TRANS_STATUS_IND = 'T'
 WHERE NOBTRAN_TRANSACTION_NO = TRANS_NO;
 END IF;

 COPY ('',SUBSTR(BLOCK_NAME,4)||'_APPROVALS_APTY');
 END ;
 END IF;
END ;

ProgramUnit.Name: START_APPROVALS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE START_APPROVALS IS 

PIDM NUMBER;
POSN VARCHAR2(6);
SUFF VARCHAR2(2);
FORM_NAME VARCHAR2(7);
ALERT_BTN NUMBER;
MODE_NAME VARCHAR2(20);

BEGIN 
--message ('start approvals, global.apply: '||:global.apply);

 IF GET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY (CALLING_FORM) = 'NBAJOBS' AND 
 :GLOBAL.TRANSACTION_NO IS NOT NULL THEN 
 :TRANSACTION_NO := TO_NUMBER(:GLOBAL.TRANSACTION_NO) - 1;
 END IF;
 GET_TRANSACTIONS (:TRANSACTION_NO,:BLOCK_NAME,:ACAT_CODE,:PIDM, :APTY_CODE, :APTY_ENTRY_SEQ_NO, :APPLY_SEQ_NO,FORM_NAME, :APPLICATION_DATE) ;
 IF :TRANSACTION_NO IS NOT NULL THEN 
 IF :SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM = FORM_NAME THEN
 GO_ITEM ('ID');
 G$_SEL_SPRIDEN_ID_NAME (:PIDM, 'NAME','Y',:ID);
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE; 
 NEXT_ITEM;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE;
 END IF;
 IF (:SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM <> FORM_NAME) THEN
 :GLOBAL.KEY_IDNO := :ID;
 :GLOBAL.APPLY := 'Y';
 :GLOBAL.TRANSACTION_NO := :TRANSACTION_NO;
 IF GET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY(CALLING_FORM) = FORM_NAME THEN 
 DO_KEY('EXIT_FORM');
 ELSE
-- :CALLED_FORM := 'Y';
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER('G$_REVOKE_ACCESS');
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE;
 G$_SECURED_FORM_CALL (:GLOBAL.CURRENT_USER, FORM_NAME,''); 
 END IF;
 IF :GLOBAL.TRANSACTION_NO = :TRANSACTION_NO THEN
 GO_ITEM ('ID');
 G$_SEL_SPRIDEN_ID_NAME (:PIDM, 'NAME','Y',:ID);
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE;
 NEXT_ITEM;
 MODE_NAME := 'NEW_FORM_INST';
 ELSIF :GLOBAL.TRANSACTION_NO IS NOT NULL THEN
 :TRANSACTION_NO := TO_NUMBER(:GLOBAL.TRANSACTION_NO) -1;
 :CALLED_FORM := 'Y';
 MODE_NAME := 'NEW_FORM_NEW_TRAN';
 ELSE
 G$_NAVIGATION_FRAME.DISABLE_OPTION('EA CONTINUE','P'); :GLOBAL.APPLY := 'N';
 END IF;
 IF :GLOBAL.APPLY = 'Y' THEN
 APPROVALS (MODE_NAME);
 END IF;
 RETURN;
 END IF;
 IF :BLOCK_NAME IS NOT NULL AND :BLOCK_NAME <> '@@@@@@' THEN 
--message ('end start_approvals, global.apply: '||:global.apply);
 GO_BLOCK (:BLOCK_NAME); 
 END IF;
 END IF;
EXCEPTION WHEN OTHERS THEN 
 :GLOBAL.ERROR_OCCURED := 'Y';
 MESSAGE ( G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0210', 'FORM',
 '*WARNING* Error on trans # %01%; Press Continue to clear transaction and proceed OR Exit to Return.'
 
 , to_char(:transaction_no)));
 :NEW_EMPLOYEE := 'Y';
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: APPROVALS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
/*******************************************
Code modified by the Forms Migration Assistant
04-Nov-2003 09:28 AM
*******************************************/

PROCEDURE APPROVALS(lv_mode_in IN VARCHAR2) IS
 lv_form_name VARCHAR2(30);
 lv_pidm spriden.spriden_pidm%TYPE;
 lv_block_name VARCHAR(30);
 lv_alert_btn NUMBER;
 lv_apply_seq_no NUMBER;
 lv_apty_seq_no NUMBER;
 lv_apty_code VARCHAR2(30);
 lv_acat_code VARCHAR2(30);
 lv_trans_no NUMBER;
 lv_hold_appl_date DATE;
 lv_skip_alert VARCHAR2(1);
 lv_alert_name VARCHAR2(30);
 lv_new_employee VARCHAR2(1) := 'N';
 lv_mode_flag VARCHAR2(20) := lv_mode_in;
BEGIN
 IF(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK = :block_name AND :check_keys <> 'Y' AND lv_mode_flag = 'NEW_BLOCK_INST')
 OR lv_mode_flag IN('CONTINUE', 'NEW_FORM_INST', 'NEW_FORM_NEW_TRAN') THEN
 IF(NVL(:global.error_occured, 'N') <> 'Y')
 AND lv_mode_flag <> 'NEW_FORM_INST'
 AND lv_mode_flag <> 'NEW_FORM_NEW_TRAN'
 AND(NVL(:application_date, SYSDATE) <= SYSDATE) THEN
 FILL_TRANS_VALUES(:transaction_no,:apty_code);
 SYNCHRONIZE;
 g$_check_failure;
 END IF;

 <<GET_NEXT_BLOCK>>
 IF NVL(:global.error_occured, 'N') <> 'Y' AND lv_mode_flag <> 'NEW_FORM_NEW_TRAN' THEN
 lv_apty_code := :apty_code;
 :hold_apty_code := :apty_code;
 lv_form_name := NVL(:ea_form_name,lv_form_name);
 IF lv_mode_flag <> 'CONTINUE' THEN
 get_trans_block(:acat_code, :transaction_no, :application_date, :apply_seq_no,
 :apty_entry_seq_no, lv_form_name, :block_name, :apty_code);
 g$_check_failure;
 END IF;
 ELSE
 lv_new_employee := NVL(:new_employee,'N');
 IF :SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK <> 'KEY_BLOCK' THEN
 DO_KEY('CLEAR_RECORD');
 g$_check_failure;
 IF f_employee_exists(lv_pidm) THEN
 DO_KEY('EXECUTE_QUERY');
 END IF;
 END IF;
 :block_name := '@@@@@@';
 END IF;

 lv_trans_no := :transaction_no;
 lv_hold_appl_date := TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(:application_date, g$_date.get_nls_date_format), g$_date.get_nls_date_format);

 <<GET_NEXT_TRANSACTION>>
 IF :block_name = '@@@@@@' THEN
 get_transactions(lv_trans_no,:block_name,:acat_code,lv_pidm, :apty_code,
 :apty_entry_seq_no, :apply_seq_no, lv_form_name, lv_hold_appl_date);
 END IF;

 SYNCHRONIZE;

 IF(:apty_code <> lv_apty_code
 OR :transaction_no <> lv_trans_no
 OR lv_trans_no IS NULL
 OR :SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM <> lv_form_name) THEN
 IF lv_trans_no IS NULL THEN
 IF(NVL(:called_form,'N') = 'Y' OR lv_mode_flag = 'CONTINUE') AND lv_new_employee = 'N' THEN
 lv_skip_alert := 'Y';
 ELSIF lv_new_employee = 'Y' THEN
 SET_ALERT_PROPERTY('EA_NEW_EMPLOYEE_2', ALERT_MESSAGE_TEXT,
 g$_nls.get('PEAEMPL-0225', 'FORM',
 'Trans no: %01% failed; No more transactions exist. Do you wish to: ', to_char(:transaction_no)));
 lv_alert_name := 'NEXT_TRANS_SEQ_2';
 ELSIF(NVL(:application_date, SYSDATE) <= SYSDATE) THEN
 SET_ALERT_PROPERTY('NEXT_TRANS_SEQ_3', ALERT_MESSAGE_TEXT,
 G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0227', 'FORM',
 'Trans no: %01% ready; No more transactions exist. Do you wish to: ', to_char(:transaction_no)));
 lv_alert_name := 'NEXT_TRANS_SEQ_3';
 ELSE
 SET_ALERT_PROPERTY('NEXT_TRANS_SEQ_3', ALERT_MESSAGE_TEXT,
 G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0229', 'FORM',
 'Unable to apply Trans no: %01% due to future apply date. No more transactions exist. ', to_char(:transaction_no)));
 lv_alert_name := 'NEXT_TRANS_SEQ_3';
 END IF;

 :update_btran_no := :transaction_no;
 :global.apply := 'N';
 :global.transaction_no := '';
 ELSIF lv_trans_no <> :transaction_no THEN
 IF(NVL(:called_form,'N') = 'Y' OR lv_mode_flag = 'CONTINUE') AND lv_new_employee = 'N' THEN
 lv_skip_alert := 'Y';
 ELSIF lv_new_employee = 'Y' THEN
 SET_ALERT_PROPERTY('EA_NEW_EMPLOYEE', ALERT_MESSAGE_TEXT,
 G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0232', 'FORM',
 'Trans no: %01% failed, more transactions exist. Do you wish to: ', to_char(:transaction_no)));
 lv_alert_name := 'EA_NEW_EMPLOYEE';
 ELSIF(NVL(:application_date, SYSDATE) <= SYSDATE) THEN
 SET_ALERT_PROPERTY('NEXT_TRANS_SEQ', ALERT_MESSAGE_TEXT,
 G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0234', 'FORM',
 'Trans no: %01% ready, more transactions exist. Do you wish to: ', to_char(:transaction_no)));
 lv_alert_name := 'NEXT_TRANS_SEQ';
 ELSE
 SET_ALERT_PROPERTY('EA_NEW_EMPLOYEE', ALERT_MESSAGE_TEXT,
 G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0236', 'FORM',
 'Unable to apply Trans no: %01% due to future apply date, more exist.', to_char(:transaction_no)));
 lv_alert_name := 'EA_NEW_EMPLOYEE';
 END IF;
 :update_btran_no := :transaction_no;
 ELSIF :apty_code <> lv_apty_code THEN
 IF(NVL(:called_form,'N') = 'Y' OR lv_mode_flag = 'CONTINUE') AND lv_new_employee = 'N' THEN
 lv_skip_alert := 'Y';
 ELSIF lv_new_employee = 'Y' THEN
 SET_ALERT_PROPERTY('EA_NEW_EMPLOYEE', ALERT_MESSAGE_TEXT,
 g$_nls.get('PEAEMPL-0239', 'FORM',
 'App Type: %01%, Trans # %02% failed; more app types exist. Do you wish to:', lv_apty_code, to_char(:transaction_no)));
 lv_alert_name := 'EA_NEW_EMPLOYEE';
 ELSIF(NVL(:application_date, SYSDATE) <= SYSDATE) THEN
 SET_ALERT_PROPERTY('NEXT_TRANS_SEQ', ALERT_MESSAGE_TEXT,
 g$_nls.Get('PEAEMPL-0241', 'FORM',
 'App Type: %01%, Trans # %02% ready; more app types exist. Do you wish to:', lv_apty_code, to_char(:transaction_no)));
 lv_alert_name := 'NEXT_TRANS_SEQ';
 ELSE
 SET_ALERT_PROPERTY('EA_NEW_EMPLOYEE', ALERT_MESSAGE_TEXT,
 g$_nls.Get('PEAEMPL-0243', 'FORM',
 'Unable to apply App Type: %01%, Trans # %02% due to apply date. More exist.', lv_apty_code, to_char(:transaction_no)));
 lv_alert_name := 'EA_NEW_EMPLOYEE';
 END IF;
 ELSIF :SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM <> lv_form_name THEN
 IF(lv_mode_flag = 'CONTINUE' OR NVL(:called_form,'N') = 'Y') THEN
 lv_skip_alert := 'Y';
 ELSIF lv_new_employee = 'Y' THEN
 SET_ALERT_PROPERTY('EA_NEW_EMPLOYEE', ALERT_MESSAGE_TEXT,
 G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0246', 'FORM',
 'Trans no: %01%; Type: %02% next form to process: %03%. Do you wish to: ', to_char(:transaction_no), lv_apty_code, lv_form_name));
 lv_alert_name := 'EA_NEW_EMPLOYEE';
 ELSIF(NVL(:application_date, SYSDATE) <= SYSDATE) THEN
 SET_ALERT_PROPERTY('NEXT_TRANS_SEQ', ALERT_MESSAGE_TEXT,
 G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0248', 'FORM',
 'Trans no: %01%; Type: %02% next form to process: %03%. Do you wish to: ', to_char(:transaction_no), lv_apty_code, lv_form_name));
 lv_alert_name := 'NEXT_TRANS_SEQ';
 ELSE
 SET_ALERT_PROPERTY('EA_NEW_EMPLOYEE', ALERT_MESSAGE_TEXT,
 G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0250', 'FORM',
 'Unable to apply Trans no: %01%; Type: %02% due to apply date. Next form: %03%', to_char(:transaction_no), lv_apty_code, lv_form_name));
 lv_alert_name := 'EA_NEW_EMPLOYEE';
 END IF;
 END IF;

 IF lv_skip_alert = 'Y' THEN
 lv_alert_btn := ALERT_BUTTON2;
 ELSE
 lv_alert_btn := SHOW_ALERT(lv_alert_name);
 END IF;

 IF NOT(GET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY(CALLING_FORM) = lv_form_name AND :global.error_occured = 'Y') THEN
 :global.error_occured := '';
 END IF;

 :new_employee := 'N';
 SYNCHRONIZE;

 IF lv_alert_btn = ALERT_BUTTON1 THEN
 DO_KEY('COMMIT_FORM');
 g$_check_status_query;
 IF lv_trans_no IS NULL THEN
 g$_navigation_frame.disable_option('EA_CONTINUE','P');
 END IF;

 :ea_form_name := lv_form_name;
 RETURN;
 ELSIF lv_alert_btn = ALERT_BUTTON2 THEN
 lv_mode_flag := 'NEW_BLOCK_INST';
 lv_skip_alert := '';

 IF :SYSTEM.FORM_STATUS <> 'QUERY' AND :SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK <> 'KEY_BLOCK'
 AND (NVL(:application_date, SYSDATE) <= SYSDATE) THEN
 VALIDATE(BLOCK_SCOPE);
 g$_check_failure;
 DO_KEY('COMMIT_FORM');
 g$_check_failure;
 END IF;

 lv_acat_code := :acat_code;
 lv_block_name := :block_name;
 lv_apply_seq_no := :apply_seq_no;
 lv_apty_seq_no := :apty_entry_seq_no;
 lv_apty_code := :apty_code;
 lv_pidm := NVL(lv_pidm, :pidm);

 IF :SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK <> 'KEY_BLOCK' THEN
 DO_KEY('CLEAR_FORM');
 g$_check_failure;
 END IF;

 IF lv_trans_no IS NOT NULL THEN
 IF :SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM = lv_form_name THEN
 :pidm := lv_pidm;
 GO_ITEM('ID');
 g$_sel_spriden_id_name(:pidm, 'NAME','Y',:id);
 g$_check_failure;
 NEXT_ITEM;

 IF NOT FORM_SUCCESS THEN
 :global.error_occured := 'Y';
 SET_ALERT_PROPERTY('G$_WARNING_ALERT', ALERT_MESSAGE_TEXT,
 G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0257', 'FORM',
 '*WARNING* Error on trans # %01%; Press Continue to clear transaction and proceed OR Exit to Return.', to_char(lv_trans_no)));
 lv_alert_btn := SHOW_ALERT('G$_WARNING_ALERT');
 :new_employee := 'Y';
 END IF;

 SYNCHRONIZE;
 :block_name := lv_block_name;
 :acat_code := lv_acat_code;
 :apply_seq_no := lv_apply_seq_no;
 :apty_entry_seq_no := lv_apty_seq_no;
 :apty_code := lv_apty_code;
 :transaction_no := lv_trans_no;
 :application_date := TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(lv_hold_appl_date, g$_date.get_nls_date_format),g$_date.get_nls_date_format);
 :called_form := 'N';
 ELSE
 :global.key_idno := :id;
 :global.apply := 'Y';
 :global.transaction_no := lv_trans_no;
 SYNCHRONIZE;
 IF GET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY(CALLING_FORM) = lv_form_name THEN
 MESSAGE(' ',NO_ACKNOWLEDGE);
 EXIT_FORM(NO_VALIDATE);
 ELSE
 MESSAGE('',NO_ACKNOWLEDGE);
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER('G$_REVOKE_ACCESS');
 g$_check_failure;
 g$_secured_form_call(:global.current_user, lv_form_name, '');
 END IF;

 IF :global.transaction_no = lv_trans_no THEN
 :pidm := lv_pidm;
 GO_ITEM('ID');
 g$_sel_spriden_id_name(:pidm, 'NAME','Y',:id);
 g$_check_failure;
 NEXT_ITEM;
 IF NOT FORM_SUCCESS THEN
 :global.error_occured := 'Y';
 SET_ALERT_PROPERTY('G$_WARNING_ALERT', ALERT_MESSAGE_TEXT,
 G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0260', 'FORM',
 '*WARNING* Error on trans # %01%; Press Continue to clear transaction and proceed OR Exit to Return.', to_char(lv_trans_no)));
 lv_alert_btn := SHOW_ALERT('G$_WARNING_ALERT');
 :new_employee := 'Y';
 END IF;

 g$_check_failure;
 SYNCHRONIZE;
 :block_name := lv_block_name;
 :acat_code := lv_acat_code;
 :apply_seq_no := lv_apply_seq_no;
 :apty_entry_seq_no := lv_apty_seq_no;
 :apty_code := lv_apty_code;
 :transaction_no := lv_trans_no;
 :application_date := TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(lv_hold_appl_date,g$_date.get_nls_date_format), g$_date.get_nls_date_format);
 IF :global.apply = 'Y' THEN
 GOTO GET_NEXT_BLOCK;
 END IF;
 ELSIF :global.transaction_no IS NOT NULL THEN
 lv_trans_no := TO_NUMBER(:global.transaction_no) -1;
 :transaction_no := lv_trans_no;
 :block_name := '@@@@@@';
 :called_form := 'Y';
 lv_new_employee := NVL(:new_employee,'N');

 IF :global.apply = 'Y' THEN
 GOTO GET_NEXT_TRANSACTION;
 END IF;
 ELSE
 g$_navigation_frame.disable_option('EA_CONTINUE','P');
 :global.apply := 'N';
 END IF;
 END IF;
 ELSE
 g$_navigation_frame.disable_option('EA_CONTINUE','P');
 END IF;
 ELSE
 :global.apply := 'N';
 G$_GOQOLIB_KEY_TRIGGER.B2K_EXIT_FORM;
 END IF;
 END IF;

 IF :global.apply = 'Y' THEN
 IF :SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK <> 'KEY BLOCK' AND :SYSTEM.FORM_STATUS <> 'QUERY' THEN
 VALIDATE(BLOCK_SCOPE);
 g$_check_failure;
 END IF;
 GO_BLOCK(:block_name);
 execute_trigger('WHEN-NEW-BLOCK-INSTANCE');
 END IF;
 END IF;
EXCEPTION WHEN OTHERS THEN
 :global.error_occured := 'Y';
 :ea_form_name := lv_form_name;
 SYNCHRONIZE;
 SET_ALERT_PROPERTY('G$_WARNING_ALERT', ALERT_MESSAGE_TEXT,
 G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0268', 'FORM',
 '*WARNING* Error on trans # %01%; Press Continue to clear transaction and proceed OR Exit to Return.', TO_CHAR(:transaction_no)));
 lv_alert_btn := SHOW_ALERT('G$_WARNING_ALERT');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: CHECK_FOR_NO_TRANS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
FUNCTION CHECK_FOR_NO_TRANS (TRANS_NO IN NUMBER, BLOCK_NAME IN VARCHAR2, APTY_CODE IN VARCHAR2)
 RETURN BOOLEAN IS
 PTI_INTO_TEMP VARCHAR2(255);
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM NORTRAN
 WHERE NORTRAN_TRANSACTION_NO = TRANS_NO
 AND NORTRAN_APTY_CODE = APTY_CODE
 AND NORTRAN_AUFM_CODE = :SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM
 AND NORTRAN_APPLY_STATUS_IND = 'P'
 and nortran_aubk_code = block_name
 AND ROWNUM = 1;
BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO PTI_INTO_TEMP ;
 RETURN (PTI_CURSOR%NOTFOUND); 

END ;

ProgramUnit.Name: GET_TRANSACTIONS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE GET_TRANSACTIONS (TRANS_NO IN OUT NUMBER,BLOCK_NAME IN OUT VARCHAR2,ACAT_CODE IN OUT VARCHAR2, PIDM IN OUT NUMBER, APTY_CODE IN OUT VARCHAR2, APTY_ENTRY_SEQ_NO IN OUT NUMBER, APPLY_SEQ_NO IN OUT NUMBER, FORM_NAME IN OUT VARCHAR2, APPL_DATE IN OUT DATE) IS


 CURSOR GET_TRANSACTIONS IS 
 SELECT NOBTRAN_TRANSACTION_NO, NOBTRAN_PIDM, NOBTRAN_ACAT_CODE,
 TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(NVL(NOBTRAN_APPLY_DATE,SYSDATE),G$_DATE.GET_NLS_DATE_FORMAT),G$_DATE.GET_NLS_DATE_FORMAT)
 FROM NOBTRAN
 WHERE NOBTRAN_APPLY_IND = 'Y'
 AND NOBTRAN_APPLY_USER_ID = USER
 AND NOBTRAN_TRANSACTION_NO > NVL(TRANS_NO,-1)
 AND NOBTRAN_TRANS_STATUS_IND IN ('A','T')
-- AND ROWNUM = 1
 ORDER BY NOBTRAN_TRANSACTION_NO;

BEGIN
ACAT_CODE := '';
OPEN GET_TRANSACTIONS;
LOOP
FETCH GET_TRANSACTIONS INTO TRANS_NO, PIDM, ACAT_CODE, APPL_DATE;

IF GET_TRANSACTIONS%FOUND THEN 

 APTY_ENTRY_SEQ_NO := 0;
 APPLY_SEQ_NO := 0;
 APTY_CODE := '';
 GET_TRANS_BLOCK (ACAT_CODE, TRANS_NO, :APPLICATION_DATE, APPLY_SEQ_NO, APTY_ENTRY_SEQ_NO, FORM_NAME, BLOCK_NAME, APTY_CODE) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE;
 IF BLOCK_NAME <> '@@@@@@' THEN 
 EXIT;
 END IF;
ELSE
 :GLOBAL.APPLY := 'N';
 TRANS_NO := '';
 EXIT;
END IF;
END LOOP;
CLOSE GET_TRANSACTIONS;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: GET_TRANS_BLOCK
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE GET_TRANS_BLOCK (ACAT_CODE IN VARCHAR2, TRANS_NO IN OUT NUMBER, APPL_DATE IN DATE, APPLY_SEQ_NO IN OUT NUMBER, APTY_SEQ_NO IN OUT NUMBER, FORM_NAME IN OUT VARCHAR2, BLOCK_NAME IN OUT VARCHAR2, APTY_CODE IN OUT VARCHAR2) IS

 CURSOR GET_BLOCK_NAME IS 
 SELECT NTRAPFB_AUFM_CODE, NTRAPFB_AUBK_CODE,NTRAPFB_APPLY_SEQ_NO
 FROM NTRAPFB
 WHERE NTRAPFB_APTY_CODE = APTY_CODE
 AND NTRAPFB_APPLY_SEQ_NO > APPLY_SEQ_NO
 ORDER BY NTRAPFB_APPLY_SEQ_NO;

 CURSOR GET_APTY_CODE IS 
 SELECT NTRACAT_APTY_ENTRY_SEQ_NO, NTRACAT_APTY_CODE
 FROM NTRACAT 
 WHERE NTRACAT_ACAT_CODE = ACAT_CODE
 AND NTRACAT_APTY_ENTRY_SEQ_NO > APTY_SEQ_NO
 ORDER BY NTRACAT_APTY_ENTRY_SEQ_NO ;


 CURSOR CHECK_NORTRAN_PENDING IS
 SELECT 'Y'
 FROM NORTRAN
 WHERE NORTRAN_TRANSACTION_NO = TRANS_NO
 AND NORTRAN_APTY_CODE = APTY_CODE
 AND NORTRAN_AUBK_CODE IN ('NBRJOBS','NBRBJOB')
 AND NORTRAN_APPLY_STATUS_IND = 'P'
 AND NORTRAN_VALUE IS NOT NULL
 AND NORTRAN_AUFD_CODE <> 'NBRJOBS_EFFECTIVE_DATE';

 CURSOR CHECK_NORTERN_PENDING IS
 SELECT 'Y'
 FROM NORTERN
 WHERE NORTERN_TRANSACTION_NO = TRANS_NO
 AND NORTERN_APTY_CODE = APTY_CODE
 AND NORTERN_APPLY_STATUS_IND = 'P';

 CURSOR CHECK_NORTLBD_PENDING IS
 SELECT 'Y'
 FROM NORTLBD
 WHERE NORTLBD_TRANSACTION_NO = TRANS_NO
 AND NORTLBD_APTY_CODE = APTY_CODE
 AND NORTLBD_APPLY_STATUS_IND = 'P';



 NORTRAN_FLAG VARCHAR2(1) := 'N';
 NORTERN_FLAG VARCHAR2(1) := 'N';
 NORTLBD_FLAG VARCHAR2(1) := 'N';
 ALERT_BTN NUMBER;

BEGIN

 OPEN GET_APTY_CODE;
 IF APTY_CODE IS NULL THEN 
 FETCH GET_APTY_CODE INTO APTY_SEQ_NO, APTY_CODE;
 IF GET_APTY_CODE%NOTFOUND THEN 
 MESSAGE ( G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0275', 'FORM',
 '*ERROR* Could not find Approval Type Code for Category: %01%' 
 , ACAT_CODE));
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE; 
 END IF;
 END IF;
 OPEN GET_BLOCK_NAME;

<<FETCH_BLOCK_NAME>>
 FETCH GET_BLOCK_NAME INTO FORM_NAME,BLOCK_NAME, APPLY_SEQ_NO;
 IF GET_BLOCK_NAME%FOUND THEN

 IF (CHECK_FOR_NO_TRANS(TRANS_NO, BLOCK_NAME, APTY_CODE)) AND FORM_NAME = :SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM THEN
 GOTO FETCH_BLOCK_NAME; 
 ELSIF FORM_NAME <> :SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM THEN 
 OPEN CHECK_NORTRAN_PENDING;
 OPEN CHECK_NORTERN_PENDING;
 OPEN CHECK_NORTLBD_PENDING;
 NORTRAN_FLAG := 'N';
 NORTERN_FLAG := 'N';
 NORTLBD_FLAG := 'N';
 FETCH CHECK_NORTRAN_PENDING INTO NORTRAN_FLAG;
 FETCH CHECK_NORTERN_PENDING INTO NORTERN_FLAG;
 FETCH CHECK_NORTLBD_PENDING INTO NORTLBD_FLAG;
 IF CHECK_NORTRAN_PENDING%NOTFOUND AND CHECK_NORTERN_PENDING%NOTFOUND AND CHECK_NORTLBD_PENDING%NOTFOUND THEN
 CLOSE CHECK_NORTRAN_PENDING;
 CLOSE CHECK_NORTERN_PENDING;
 CLOSE CHECK_NORTLBD_PENDING;
 GOTO FETCH_BLOCK_NAME;
 END IF;
 CLOSE CHECK_NORTRAN_PENDING;
 CLOSE CHECK_NORTERN_PENDING;
 CLOSE CHECK_NORTLBD_PENDING;
 END IF; 
 CLOSE GET_BLOCK_NAME;
 :GLOBAL.APPLY := 'Y'; 
 ELSE
 BEGIN 
 CLOSE GET_BLOCK_NAME;
 LOOP
 FETCH GET_APTY_CODE INTO APTY_SEQ_NO, APTY_CODE;
 IF GET_APTY_CODE%FOUND THEN 
 APPLY_SEQ_NO := 0; /* reset for new apty code */
 OPEN GET_BLOCK_NAME;
 LOOP 
 FETCH GET_BLOCK_NAME INTO FORM_NAME, BLOCK_NAME, APPLY_SEQ_NO;
 IF GET_BLOCK_NAME%NOTFOUND THEN
 EXIT;
 ELSE
 :GLOBAL.APPLY := 'Y';
 END IF;
 IF NOT CHECK_FOR_NO_TRANS (TRANS_NO, BLOCK_NAME, APTY_CODE) AND FORM_NAME = :SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM THEN
 EXIT;
 ELSIF FORM_NAME <> :SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM THEN
 OPEN CHECK_NORTRAN_PENDING;
 OPEN CHECK_NORTERN_PENDING;
 OPEN CHECK_NORTLBD_PENDING;
 NORTRAN_FLAG := 'N';
 NORTERN_FLAG := 'N';
 NORTLBD_FLAG := 'N';
 FETCH CHECK_NORTRAN_PENDING INTO NORTRAN_FLAG;
 FETCH CHECK_NORTERN_PENDING INTO NORTERN_FLAG;
 FETCH CHECK_NORTLBD_PENDING INTO NORTLBD_FLAG;
 IF CHECK_NORTRAN_PENDING%FOUND OR CHECK_NORTERN_PENDING%FOUND OR CHECK_NORTLBD_PENDING%FOUND THEN
 CLOSE CHECK_NORTRAN_PENDING;
 CLOSE CHECK_NORTERN_PENDING;
 CLOSE CHECK_NORTLBD_PENDING;
 EXIT;
 END IF;
 CLOSE CHECK_NORTRAN_PENDING;
 CLOSE CHECK_NORTERN_PENDING;
 CLOSE CHECK_NORTLBD_PENDING;
 END IF; 
 END LOOP;
 CLOSE GET_BLOCK_NAME;
 IF ((NOT CHECK_FOR_NO_TRANS (TRANS_NO, BLOCK_NAME, APTY_CODE)) AND FORM_NAME = 'PEAEMPL') OR NORTRAN_FLAG = 'Y' OR NORTERN_FLAG = 'Y' OR NORTLBD_FLAG ='Y' THEN
 EXIT;
 END IF;
 ELSE
 BLOCK_NAME := '@@@@@@';
 :GLOBAL.APPLY := 'N';
 EXIT;
 END IF;
 END LOOP;
 CLOSE GET_APTY_CODE;
 END;
 END IF;

END;

ProgramUnit.Name: UPDATE_NOBTRAN_APPLY_STATUS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE UPDATE_NOBTRAN_APPLY_STATUS (TRANS_NO IN OUT NUMBER, APPL_DATE IN DATE) IS

CURSOR CHECK_NORTRAN IS
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM NORTRAN
 WHERE NORTRAN_TRANSACTION_NO = TRANS_NO
 AND NORTRAN_VALUE IS NOT NULL
 AND NORTRAN_APPLY_STATUS_IND = 'P'
 AND NORTRAN_AUFD_CODE <> 'NBRJOBS_EFFECTIVE_DATE';

CURSOR CHECK_NORTERN IS
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM NORTERN
 WHERE NORTERN_TRANSACTION_NO = TRANS_NO
 AND NORTERN_APPLY_STATUS_IND = 'P';

CURSOR CHECK_NORTLBD IS
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM NORTLBD
 WHERE NORTLBD_TRANSACTION_NO = TRANS_NO
 AND NORTLBD_APPLY_STATUS_IND = 'P';

DUMMY VARCHAR2(1);

BEGIN 
IF TRANS_NO IS NOT NULL THEN

 OPEN CHECK_NORTRAN;
 FETCH CHECK_NORTRAN INTO DUMMY;
 IF CHECK_NORTRAN%FOUND THEN
 RETURN;
 END IF;
 CLOSE CHECK_NORTRAN;

 OPEN CHECK_NORTERN;
 FETCH CHECK_NORTERN INTO DUMMY;
 IF CHECK_NORTERN%FOUND THEN
 RETURN;
 END IF;
 CLOSE CHECK_NORTERN;

 OPEN CHECK_NORTLBD;
 FETCH CHECK_NORTLBD INTO DUMMY;
 IF CHECK_NORTLBD%FOUND THEN
 RETURN;
 END IF;
 CLOSE CHECK_NORTLBD;


 UPDATE NORTRAN
 SET NORTRAN_APPLY_STATUS_IND = 'A'
 WHERE NORTRAN_TRANSACTION_NO = TRANS_NO
 AND NORTRAN_VALUE IS NULL 
 AND NORTRAN_APPLY_STATUS_IND = 'P';

 UPDATE NOBTRAN
 SET NOBTRAN_APPLY_IND = 'N',
 NOBTRAN_TRANS_STATUS_IND = 'C'
 WHERE NOBTRAN_TRANSACTION_NO = TRANS_NO;

 UPDATE NORROUT 
 SET NORROUT_QUEUE_STATUS_IND = 'L',
 NORROUT_STATUS_DATE_TIME = TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,''||G$_DATE.GET_NLS_DATE_FORMAT||' HH24:MI:SS'),
 ''||G$_DATE.GET_NLS_DATE_FORMAT||' HH24:MI:SS'),
 NORROUT_ACTION_USER_ID = USER
 WHERE NORROUT_TRANSACTION_NO = TRANS_NO
 AND NORROUT_ACTION_IND = 'L';

 TRANS_NO := '';
END IF;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: FILL_TRANS_VALUES
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE FILL_TRANS_VALUES (TRANS_NO IN NUMBER,APTY_CODE IN VARCHAR2) IS

 NEW_VALUE VARCHAR2(60);
 FIELD_NAME VARCHAR2(30);

 CURSOR GET_NORTRAN_REC IS
 SELECT NORTRAN_AUFD_CODE, DECODE(NORTRAN_VALUE,'-','',NORTRAN_VALUE)
 FROM NORTRAN
 WHERE NORTRAN_TRANSACTION_NO = TRANS_NO
 AND NORTRAN_APTY_CODE = APTY_CODE
 AND NORTRAN_AUFM_CODE = :SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM
 AND NORTRAN_AUBK_CODE = :SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK
 AND NORTRAN_APPLY_STATUS_IND = 'P'
 AND NORTRAN_VALUE IS NOT NULL
 order by decode(nortran_aufd_code,'PEBEMPL_ECLS_CODE',1,'PEBEMPL_COAS_CODE_HOME',2,'PEBEMPL_ORGN_CODE_HOME',3,'PEBEMPL_CURRENT_HIRE_DATE',4,99);

 
 BEGIN
 OPEN GET_NORTRAN_REC;
 FETCH GET_NORTRAN_REC INTO FIELD_NAME, NEW_VALUE;
 WHILE GET_NORTRAN_REC%FOUND LOOP
 go_item(field_name);
 COPY (APTY_CODE,SUBSTR(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK,4)||'_APPROVALS_APTY');
 COPY (NEW_VALUE,FIELD_NAME);
 validate(item_scope);
 g$_check_failure;
 FETCH GET_NORTRAN_REC INTO FIELD_NAME, NEW_VALUE;
 END LOOP;
 CLOSE GET_NORTRAN_REC;
EXCEPTION
WHEN FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE THEN
 :GLOBAL.ERROR_OCCURED := 'Y';
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: SELECT_PTVORGN_4

FUNCTION SELECT_PTVORGN_4 (IVAR_1 VARCHAR2, OVAR_1 IN OUT VARCHAR2)

 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT SUBSTR(PTVORGN_DESC, 1, 25)
 FROM PTVORGN
 WHERE PTVORGN_CODE = IVAR_1 ;
 BEGIN

 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO OVAR_1 ;
 RETURN (PTI_CURSOR%NOTFOUND) ;
 END ;

ProgramUnit.Name: F_EMPLOYEE_EXISTS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
FUNCTION f_employee_exists(p_pidm spriden.spriden_pidm%TYPE)
RETURN BOOLEAN IS
 lv_temp VARCHAR2(1) := 'N';
 CURSOR pti_cursor IS
 SELECT 'Y'
 FROM pebempl
 WHERE pebempl_pidm = p_pidm;
BEGIN
 OPEN pti_cursor;
 FETCH pti_cursor INTO lv_temp;
 CLOSE pti_cursor;

 RETURN lv_temp = 'Y';
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: AUDIT_TRAIL_2_1
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE AUDIT_TRAIL_2_1 IS
BEGIN
 NULL;
/*
AUDIT TRAIL: 2.1
1. Forms 4.0 conversion. RLP 08-23-94
2. DEFECT# 2087 - Corrected I-9 date field-getting unhandled RLP 11-15-94
 exception value error when acknowledging an
 error on date format.
3. Added referenced trigger N$_GUROPTM_CALL_FORM. RLP 11-16-97
4. Added country to the title of the U.S. and Canadian RLP 11-28-94
 regulatory windows.
5. 2.1 Pink Slip Mods: RLP 12-09-94
 A. Change call of form 'POAIDEN' to call of form 'POIIDEN'.
 B. Aligned all tags and LOV's.
 C. Rearranged Employee Statuses in drop down list to match 
 Statuses of Jobs.
6. Added references: DF 01-06-95
 A. PTVORGN_RG
 B. G$FTVORGN_RGD
 C. PTVORGN_LOV
7. Modification/System Testing corrections. RLP 01-24-95
AUDIT TRAIL: 2.1.11
1. Faculty Admin Enhancement. AY 09/04/1996
 Added Faculty button to form, enables user to access the new Faculty form.
2. Forms 4.5 Conversion. LB 09-10-96
3. Status Change enhancement/Leave Date. AY 10/10/1996
4. Problem: User applies changes to PEAEMPL for an employee in MW 02/19/97
 NOAEPAF form and got to PEAEMPL form and the system
 gave the error that the address information was missing.
 This is a valid error. But, the warning message,
 'Press continue to clear transaction and proceed.', needs
 to be expanded upon. For this particular case the CONTINUE
 button is disabled and there are no other transactions to
 process.
 Functional Impact: User needs a more expanded warning message.
 Technical Fix: Added to the end of the warning messages in both
 procedures, APPROVALS and START_APPROVALS, the following
 expanded message.
 ' OR Exit to Return'
5. HR Test error number: LS089 AY 02/27/1997
 Problem: Should allow termination date >= personnel date found on jobs where the
 status is T.
 Functional Impact: Now user can enter termination date greater or equal to personnel
 date.
 Tech. Fix: Add above logic in EDIT_TERM_DATE trigger.
6. Problem: Could not see the system message when records is saved. AY 02/27/1997
 Functional Impact: Now user can see the message.
 Tech. Fix: Take out the Character mode check in WHEN-NEW-FORM-INSTANCE.
7. Error Number: VT0017 AY 03/12/1997
 Problem: When user tries to terminate a employee, got an error message:
 '*ERROR* Leave of Absence End Date must be entered for this employee.'
 Functional Impact: Now the user will get this message only when the Leave of Absence
 Code and LOA_BEG_DATE is not null and LOV_END_DATE is null.
 Tech. Fix: Put a check on LOA_CODE, LOV_BEG_DATE and LOV_END_DATE in POST-CHANGE trigger
 of TREA_CODE.
AUDIT TRAIL END
*/
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: AUDIT_TRAIL_3_0
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE AUDIT_TRAIL_3_0 IS
/*
AUDIT TRAIL: 3.0
1. MIS defect #: 6293 AY 04/04/97
 Problem: Unable to update employee leave balances on the Employee Form. 
 Receive error message that the Balance cannot be greater than defined on 
 PTRLCAT. The PEAEMPL form is validating Original Hire as a code 'O' but 
 the PTRLCAT inserts an 'F' for Original Hire when selected from the drop 
 down list of values. 
 Functional Impact: Now the forms will insert correct value.
 Tech. Fix: Change the inserted value.
2. Enhancement CS 05/13/97 
 Functional Impact: None
 Technical Fix: Replaced all V2 style triggers with triggers which execute
 packaged procedures as follows:
 
 EDIT_COAS_HOME nokfoap.p_edit_foapal
 EDIT_COAS_DIST nokfoap.p_edit_foapal
 EDIT_ORGN nokfoap.p_edit_foapal
 EDIT_ORGN2 nokfoap.p_edit_foapal
3. RPM 1777 LR 20-MAY-1997
 Enhancement - Form has to show exact data and time of effective date.
 Functional Impact - Field Effective Date shows exact date and time.
 Technical Fix - Changed data type property of item EFFECTIVE_DATE 
 to Datetime.
4.Defect LR 09-JUN-1997
 Problem - US Regulatory window is sized incorrectly.
 Functional Impact - Now US Regulatory window is sized correctly.Befor size of the window
 did not fit a screen.
 Technical Fix - Changed height of the FLSA_WINDOW window from 18 to 17.
5.Changed name of reference library NOQLIBR from low to upper case in G$_GUROPTM_CALL_FORM. LR 25-JUN-1997
6. Problem - Terminated/deceased check not working properly. MF 06-23-97
 Technical Fix - Moved N$_CHECK_PIDM from KEY_BLOCK.ID
 POST-CHANGE trigger to the CHECK_KEYS trigger.
7. CONTACT NUMBER: 2151222 AH 23-JUL-97
 Problem: When selecting LEAVES button from the PEAESCH form we should be taken
 directly into the Leave Balances window on the peaempl form. Instead we are 
 left in the Employee Information area.
 Functional Impact: We are now able to move directly to the Leave Balances form.
 Technical Fix: Added a null canvas item to the form header of PEAEMPL called 'CALLED_FORM_IND'.
 Then added,
 :CALLED_FORM_IND := NVL(:GLOBAL.FORM_WAS_CALLED,'N');
 to the WHEN_NEW_FORM_INSTANCE trigger in PEAEMPL.
 Also added,
 IF NVL(:CALLED_FORM_IND,'N')='Y' THEN
 :CALLED_FORM_IND := 'N';
 RETURN;
 END IF;
 to the WHEN_WINDOW_ACTIVATED trigger in PEAEMPL.
8. QA #2151702 CS 07-28-97
 Problem: For on-line EA apply, some alerts showing double &'s. For example,
 Save&&View.
 Functional Impact: User will see proper labels on alert buttons.
 Technical Fix: Changed button lables in NEXT_TRANS_SEQ and NEXT_TRANS_SEQ_3. 
9. Contact Number: 2151222 AY 07/28/1997
 Problem: When the form is called by PEAESCH and go directly to PERLEAV block,
 user will have to press EXECUTE_QUERY to query data.
 Functional Impact: Now the form will execute query automatically when called by
 PEAESCH form.
 Tech. Fix: Add EXECUTE_QUERY in WHEN-NEW-BLOCK-INSTANCE trigger. 
AUDIT TRAIL END
*/
BEGIN
 NULL;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: AUDIT_TRAIL_3_1
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE AUDIT_TRAIL_3_1 IS
/* 
AUDIT TRAIL: 3.1 INIT DATE
1. Year 2000 compliance SL 2/23/98
 Modified routines are as follows:
 APPROVALS PU
 GET_TRANSACTIONS PU
 INSERT_PEREHIS_11 PU
 LEAVE_CODES PEBEMPL BL TRG
 UPD_LEAV_CODE PEBEMPL BL TRG

2. Defect 8908 KN 03/26/98 

 Problem : The user is unable to re-query on any id, once an ID is querried.

 Reason : The validation property is turned false in Set_Form_Property call, which 
 suppresses firing of Post-change trigger on ID in KEY_BLOCK.

 Fix : Deactivated Set_Form_Property call in When-New-Block-Instance at form level,
 which makes Validation property false.
3. RPM #4659 MW 04/03/98
 Enhancement: Modify logic to not perform the edit for 'Update Job(s) status first
 before entering leave begin date' if the PTRLREA_STATUS associated with
 the PTRLREA_CODE is 'A'ctive.
 Technical Fix: Modified the CHECK_LEAVE_DATES trigger in the PEBEMPL block by adding
 a new cursor, PTRLREA_STATUS_CURSOR. The CHECK_LEAVE_DATES trigger is
 called from both the PRE-INSERT and PRE-UPDATE triggers of PEBEMPL block.
4. No Defect AA 24-APR-1998
 Problem: An employee record entered from PEAHIRE and an employee record entered
 from PEAEMPL by two different users at the same time, result in a 
 record update which may go temporarily unknown to both users. 
 Functional Impact: An error message is displayed when an attempted insert of an
 employee record occurs from PEAHIRE or PEAEMPL if the record has already 
 been inserted.
 Technical Fix: Added trigger CHECK_RECORD_STATUS which is executed from the 
 NEW_HIRE_CONTROL procedure and again from the PRE-INSERT trigger on
 block PEBEMPL.
*/
/* 5. Contact #2192006 AA 28-MAY-1998
 Problem: When attempting to save record with an error in the US Regulatory Section
 of the form, display goes back to the first page of the form (General
 Employee Info section) when it should remain in the US Reg window.
 Functional Impact: Form will now remain on the US Reg Section when attempting to
 save an invalid record.
 Technical Fix: Modified Key-Commit trigger in block pebempl to execute 'FLSA_WKPR'
 and 'VERIFY_I9' triggers prior to the Commit-Form command. 
 6. Contact #2196381 GK 06/05/98
 Problem => If you click in a field where data has not been entered (such as employee
 group), no fields are populated.
 Functional Impact=> The user can click on any item in the next block now to
 to populate the data. Even when the next block is performed
 on employee group field. 
 Technical Resolution=> Changed the logic in the POST-TEXT-ITEM trigger on
 employee group field. Added as follows,
 IF :system.record_status IN ( 'CHANGED','INSERT','QUERY') THEN
 IF :PEBEMPL_EGRP_CODE IS NULL THEN
 :EGRP_DESC := ' ' ;
 END IF ;
 END IF;
 7. Contact #2196911 GK 06/08/1998
 Problem=> Character Mode: The Service Industry button is missing the close bracket ) 
 on the field/button.
 Functional Impact=> Now the Service Industry button is having the close bracket.
 Technical Fix=> Increased the width of the button to 1 more char. Similarely
 increased the width of Grouping button by 1 char to make it
 left aligned with Service Industry button.
 8. Contact #2202377 LR 14-JUL-1998
 Problem: Form was not perform a Rollback function when creating a new record 
 prior to all fields being completed. 
 Functional Impact : Now you can perform a rollback function when creating a new
 record prior to all fields being completed if you do not have any problem.
 Technical Fix - Changed trigger ON-ERROR on block PEBEMPL.
 9. Contact #2203504 MS 20-JUL-1998
 Pproblem: Spelling error in the auto hint for the Employee Group Field.
 Functional Impact: None
 Technical Fix: Corrected the Spelling Error.
 10. Contact #2203673 MS 20-JUL-1998
 Pproblem: Spelling error in the Option Menu on PPAIDEN.
 Functional Impact: None
 Technical Fix: Corrected the Spelling Error in GUAOPTM, removed an extra "A" 
 from PPAIDEN.
 11. Contact #2199876 E.T 07/01/98
 Problem: Capture time is stored as 12:00:00 AM on PEIEHIS.
 Functional Impact: Time stamp will be stored in Peiehis. No time stamp will be stored
 only for Leave On Absence and Terminated.
 Technical Fix: Modified the property of :effective_date item as Datetime.
 
AUDIT TRAIL END
*/
BEGIN
 NULL;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: N$_FOAPAL_LIST
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE N$_FOAPAL_LIST IS
BEGIN
 G$_COPY_FLD_ATTR;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER('G$_REVOKE_ACCESS');
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE;
 G$_SECURED_FORM_CALL(NAME_IN('GLOBAL.CURRENT_USER'),'FTV' || SUBSTR(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.CURSOR_ITEM'),
 (INSTR(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM'),'.') + 9),4),'QUERY_NOHIDE');
 G$_RESET_GLOBAL;
 IF NAME_IN('GLOBAL.VALUE') IS NOT NULL THEN
 IF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.CURSOR_ITEM'),UPDATEABLE) = 'TRUE'
 OR (GET_ITEM_PROPERTY(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.CURSOR_ITEM'),UPDATE_NULL) = 'TRUE'
 AND NAME_IN('SYSTEM.CURSOR_VALUE') IS NULL)
 OR NAME_IN('SYSTEM.MODE') <> 'NORMAL'
 OR NAME_IN('SYSTEM.RECORD_STATUS') = 'NEW'
 OR NAME_IN('SYSTEM.RECORD_STATUS') = 'INSERT' THEN
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER('LIST_VALUES_COPY');
 COPY('','GLOBAL.VALUE');
 DO_KEY('NEXT_ITEM');
 ELSE
 MESSAGE( G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0291', 'FORM','*ERROR* Item is protected against update.') );
 END IF;
 END IF;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: POPULATE_PTQECLC_RG
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE POPULATE_PTQECLC_RG(FIELD_NAME IN VARCHAR2) IS
 VALUE_OF_FIELD VARCHAR2(3) := NAME_IN(FIELD_NAME);
 RG_LOGIC VARCHAR2(500) := 'select ptreclc_lcat_code, ptvlcat_desc,
 to_char(ptreclc_activity_date,'''||G$_DATE.GET_NLS_DATE_FORMAT||''') ptreclc_activity_date 
 from ptreclc, ptvlcat ';
 WHERE_STMT VARCHAR2(200) := 'WHERE ptreclc_lcat_code = ptvlcat_code 
 and ptreclc_code = ';
 ORDER_BY VARCHAR2(200) := 'ORDER BY ptreclc_lcat_code';

 ERROR_NUMBER NUMBER;

 BEGIN
 
 RG_LOGIC := RG_LOGIC||WHERE_STMT||''''||VALUE_OF_FIELD||''''||ORDER_BY;
 ERROR_NUMBER := POPULATE_GROUP_WITH_QUERY('PTQECLC_RG',RG_LOGIC);
 IF ERROR_NUMBER <> 0 THEN
 MESSAGE ( G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0296', 'FORM',
 'Oracle Error %01%' 
 , to_char(error_number)));
 END IF;
 END;

ProgramUnit.Name: POPULATE_PTQLCAT_RG
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE POPULATE_PTQLCAT_RG(FIELD_NAME IN VARCHAR2) IS
 VALUE_OF_FIELD VARCHAR2(3) := NAME_IN(FIELD_NAME);
 RG_LOGIC VARCHAR2(500) := 'select ptrlvas_leav_code, ptrleav_long_desc,
 to_char(ptrlvas_activity_date,'''||G$_DATE.GET_NLS_DATE_FORMAT||''') ptrlvas_activity_date 
 from ptrlvas, ptrleav ';
 WHERE_STMT VARCHAR2(200) := 'WHERE ptrlvas_leav_code = ptrleav_code 
 and ptrlvas_lcat_code = ';
 ORDER_BY VARCHAR2(200) := 'ORDER BY ptrlvas_leav_code';

 ERROR_NUMBER NUMBER;

 BEGIN
 RG_LOGIC := RG_LOGIC||WHERE_STMT||''''||VALUE_OF_FIELD||''''||ORDER_BY;
 ERROR_NUMBER := POPULATE_GROUP_WITH_QUERY('PTQLCAT_RG',RG_LOGIC);
 IF ERROR_NUMBER <> 0 THEN
 MESSAGE( G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0301', 'FORM','*ERROR* No records exist to query LOV.') );
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 -- MESSAGE ('Oracle Error '||to_char(error_number));
 
 END IF;
 END;

ProgramUnit.Name: AUDIT_TRAIL_5_3
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE AUDIT_TRAIL_5_3 IS
/*
AUDIT TRAIL: 5.3

1. Adding GUIALTI to Option List Window, LN 16-NOV-2001

2. Defect 57277, LN 26-Nov-200 
 Problem:
 Form allows a next block function without an ID in the key block. 
 Functional Impact:
 Form allows a next block function only with an ID in the key block. 
 Technical Fix:
 Modified key-block.check_keys to check for id
 Old:
 G$_CHECK_VALUE ((:KEY_BLOCK.PIDM IS NULL),
 '*ERROR* A valid ID must be entered for this function.', TRUE, TRUE);
 New:
 G$_CHECK_VALUE ((:KEY_BLOCK.ID IS NULL),
 '*ERROR* A valid ID must be entered for this function.', TRUE, TRUE);

3. Defect 53-0032, LN 7-Jan-2002
 Problem:
 The following logic needs to be removed from PRE_FORM_TRG trigger 
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER('LOAD_CURRENT_RELEASE');
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER('G$_VERIFY_ACCESS');
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE;
 This change needed to be done as per 4.0 Methodology and must have been overlooked. 
 Technical Fix:
 Removed the suggested codes and closed the cursor in PRE_FORM_TRG trigger.
 
AUDIT TRAIL END
*/
BEGIN
 NULL;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: AUDIT_TRAIL_5_3_0_1
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE AUDIT_TRAIL_5_3_0_1 IS
/*
AUDIT TRAIL: 5.3.0.1

1. Defect 68057, MK 10-APR-2002 
 Problem:
 Form kicks you out of Banner when you do a next block function to get into 
 the main body of the form. This happens only on terminated employees. 
 Situations where this has been recreated:
 1)login into banner and the first person you query on PEAEMPL is a 
 terminated person;
 2)terminate an employee; exit PEAEMPL and the go back in and try to query 
 a terminated person;
 The workaround is to query an active person, rollback and you will be able
 to query a terminated person or reactivate them.
 Functional Impact:
 Form does not kick you out of banner anymore for the above conditions. 
 Technical Fix:
 Added the following code to the Key-NxtBlk trigger of KEY_BLOCK:
 " IF :GLOBAL.APPLY = 'Y'
 OR NVL(:GLOBAL.NEW_HIRE_IND,'N') = 'Y' THEN
 :SYSTEM.MESSAGE_LEVEL := 5;
 END IF;
 EXECUTE_QUERY ; 
 :SYSTEM.MESSAGE_LEVEL := 0; "

2. Defect 9870 MK 01-APR-2002 
 Problem:
 We are trying to activate a terminated employee, however, 
 the orgn code is also terminated.
 Functional Impact:
 The form will now allow the status AND charts and orgs to
 be changed on a term'd employee. Then save. Then other 
 fields can be updated. 
 Technical Fix:
 Removed the following conditions from the where clause of 
 PTI_CURSOR in trigger TERMINATE_REC of PEBEMPL block:

 " AND PEBEMPL_ORGN_CODE_HOME = :PEBEMPL_ORGN_CODE_HOME
 AND PEBEMPL_ORGN_CODE_DIST = :PEBEMPL_ORGN_CODE_DIST
 AND NVL(pebempl_coas_code_home, '*') = NVL(
 :pebempl_coas_code_home, '*')
 AND NVL(pebempl_coas_code_dist, '*') = NVL(
 :pebempl_coas_code_dist, '*') " 
AUDIT TRAIL: 5.3.3
1.VETS-100 Enhancement LR 06/19/2002
Added PEBEMPL_JBLN_CODE, JBLN_DESC, PEBEMPL_COLL_CODE, COLL_DESC,
PEBEMPL_CAMP_CODE, PCAMP_DESC fields to PEBEMPL Block. Created new
canvas HLOCATION_7_CANVAS and new window HLOCATION_WINDOW.
Added trigger MNU_OPTM_WIN_HLOCATION to the form level.
Changed triggers DISABLE_BTNS and ENABLE_BTNS.
AUDIT TRAIL END
*/
BEGIN
 NULL;
END;

BEGIN
 IF :SYSTEM.CURRENT_ITEM IN (
 'PEBEMPL_EMPL_STATUS', 
 'PEBEMPL_ECLS_CODE',
 'PEBEMPL_EGRP_CODE',
 'PEBEMPL_LCAT_CODE',
 'PEBEMPL_BCAT_CODE',
 'PEBEMPL_INTERNAL_FT_PT_IND',
 'PEBEMPL_COAS_CODE_HOME',
 'PEBEMPL_ORGN_CODE_HOME',
 'PEBEMPL_COAS_CODE_DIST',
 'PEBEMPL_ORGN_CODE_DIST',
 'PEBEMPL_DICD_CODE',
 'PEBEMPL_CURRENT_HIRE_DATE',
 'PEBEMPL_FIRST_HIRE_DATE',
 'PEBEMPL_ADJ_SERVICE_DATE',
 'PEBEMPL_SENIORITY_DATE',
 'PEBEMPL_FIRST_WORK_DATE',
 'PEBEMPL_LAST_WORK_DATE',
 'PEBEMPL_TREA_CODE',
 'PEBEMPL_TERM_DATE',
 'PEBEMPL_LREA_CODE',

 'PEBEMPL_LOA_END_DATE',
 'PEBEMPL_JBLN_CODE',
 'PEBEMPL_COLL_CODE',
 'PEBEMPL_CAMP_CODE') THEN

 RETURN 'PEBEMPL'; -- General Employee tabpage
 ELSIF :SYSTEM.CURRENT_ITEM IN (

 'PEBEMPL_WKPR_CODE',
 'PEBEMPL_I9_FORM_IND',
 'PEBEMPL_I9_DATE',
 'PEBEMPL_I9_EXPIRE_DATE',

 'PEBEMPL_SSN_MI',
 'PEBEMPL_SSN_SUFFIX',

 RETURN 'FLSA'; -- United States Regulatory
 ELSIF :SYSTEM.CURRENT_ITEM IN (

 'PEBEMPL_STGR_CODE') THEN

ProgramUnit.Name: P_POPULATE_LIST
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
--
-- This procedure is used to populate values for the given list item.
--
PROCEDURE P_POPULATE_LIST(
 p_item_name VARCHAR2,
 p_item_list VARCHAR2) IS
--
 lv_rg_name VARCHAR2(30) := 'DEFAULT_RG';
 lv_rg_id RECORDGROUP := FIND_GROUP(lv_rg_name);
 lv_list_id ITEM := FIND_ITEM(p_item_name);
 lv_id_count PLS_INTEGER;
 lv_query_text VARCHAR2(3000) := p_item_list;
--
BEGIN
 IF ID_NULL(lv_rg_id) THEN
 lv_rg_id := CREATE_GROUP_FROM_QUERY(lv_rg_name, lv_query_text);
 lv_id_count := POPULATE_GROUP(lv_rg_id);
 ELSE
 DELETE_GROUP_ROW(lv_rg_id,ALL_ROWS);
 lv_id_count := POPULATE_GROUP_WITH_QUERY(lv_rg_id, lv_query_text);
 END IF;
--
 POPULATE_LIST(lv_list_id, lv_rg_name);
END;
