ProgramUnit.Name: VALIDATE_PF
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE validate_pf IS
begin
 DECLARE
 PTI_INTO_TEMP VARCHAR2(255);
 eeog VARCHAR2(2);

 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR1 IS
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM NBRBJOB
 WHERE NBRBJOB_PIDM = :PEBEMPL_PIDM
 AND nbrbjob_ipeds_rept_ind = 'Y';

 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR2 IS
 SELECT 'X', ptrecls_eeog_code
 FROM nbrclsh A,
 nbrposh B,
 nbrjobs,
 nbrbjob,
 ptrecls
 WHERE nbrbjob_pidm = :PEBEMPL_PIDM 
 AND nbrbjob_ipeds_rept_ind = 'Y'
 AND nbrjobs_pidm = nbrbjob_pidm
 AND nbrjobs_posn = nbrbjob_posn
 AND nbrjobs_suff = nbrbjob_suff
 AND nbrjobs_effective_date = (
 SELECT MAX(nbrjobs_effective_date)
 FROM nbrjobs
 WHERE nbrjobs_pidm = nbrbjob_pidm
 AND nbrjobs_posn = nbrbjob_posn
 AND nbrjobs_suff = nbrbjob_suff
 AND TRUNC(nbrjobs_effective_date) <= TRUNC(SYSDATE))
 AND nbrposh_posn = nbrjobs_posn
 AND nbrposh_change_date_time = (
 SELECT MAX(nbrposh_change_date_time)
 FROM nbrposh
 WHERE nbrposh_posn = B.nbrposh_posn
 AND TRUNC(nbrposh_change_date_time) <= TRUNC(SYSDATE))
 AND nbrclsh_code = nbrposh_pcls_code
 AND nbrclsh_change_date_time = (
 SELECT MAX(nbrclsh_change_date_time)
 FROM nbrclsh
 WHERE nbrclsh_code = A.nbrclsh_code
 AND TRUNC(nbrclsh_change_date_time) <= TRUNC(SYSDATE))
 AND SUBSTR(nbrclsh_eskl_code, 1, 1) IN ('2','8') 
 AND ptrecls_code = nbrjobs_ecls_code;
BEGIN
 IF :PEBEMPL_IPEDS_PRIMARY_FUNCTION <> 'N' THEN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR1;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR1 INTO PTI_INTO_TEMP ;
 IF PTI_CURSOR1%NOTFOUND THEN
 CLOSE PTI_CURSOR1;
 MESSAGE( G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0092', 'FORM',
 '*ERROR* An IPEDS reportable job does not exists for this Primary Function.')) ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 ELSE
 CLOSE PTI_CURSOR1;
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR2;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR2 INTO PTI_INTO_TEMP, eeog ;
 IF PTI_CURSOR2%NOTFOUND THEN
 CLOSE PTI_CURSOR2;
 MESSAGE( G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0092', 'FORM',
 '*ERROR* An IPEDS reportable job does not exists for this Primary Function.')) ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE; 
 END IF;
 CLOSE PTI_CURSOR2;
 IF eeog NOT IN ('1','2','4','5') THEN
 MESSAGE( G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0092', 'FORM',
 '*ERROR* The EEO Contract Group (PTRECLS) is invalid for the Primary Function.')) ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE; 
 END IF; 
 END IF;
 END IF;
END;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: CHECK_PACKAGE_FAILURE
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
Procedure Check_Package_Failure IS
BEGIN
 IF NOT ( Form_Success ) THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: QUERY_MASTER_DETAILS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE Query_Master_Details(rel_id Relation,detail VARCHAR2) IS
 oldmsg VARCHAR2(2); -- Old Message Level Setting
 reldef VARCHAR2(5); -- Relation Deferred Setting
BEGIN
 --
 -- Initialize Local Variable(s)
 --
 reldef := Get_Relation_Property(rel_id, DEFERRED_COORDINATION);
 oldmsg := :System.Message_Level;
 --
 -- If NOT Deferred, Goto detail and execute the query.
 --
 IF reldef = 'FALSE' THEN
 Go_Block(detail);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 :System.Message_Level := '10';
 Execute_Query;
 :System.Message_Level := oldmsg;
 ELSE
 --
 -- Relation is deferred, mark the detail block as un-coordinated
 --
 Set_Block_Property(detail, COORDINATION_STATUS, NON_COORDINATED);
 END IF;

EXCEPTION
 WHEN Form_Trigger_Failure THEN
 :System.Message_Level := oldmsg;
 RAISE;
END Query_Master_Details;

ProgramUnit.Name: CLEAR_ALL_MASTER_DETAILS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE Clear_All_Master_Details IS
 mastblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Initial Master Block Causing Coord
 coordop VARCHAR2(30); -- Operation Causing the Coord
 trigblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Cur Block On-Clear-Details Fires On
 startitm VARCHAR2(61); -- Item in which cursor started
 frmstat VARCHAR2(15); -- Form Status
 curblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Block
 currel VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Relation
 curdtl VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Detail Block

 FUNCTION First_Changed_Block_Below(Master VARCHAR2)
 RETURN VARCHAR2 IS
 curblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Block
 currel VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Relation
 retblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Return Block
 BEGIN
 --
 -- Initialize Local Vars
 --
 curblk := Master;
 currel := Get_Block_Property(curblk, FIRST_MASTER_RELATION);
 --
 -- While there exists another relation for this block
 --
 WHILE currel IS NOT NULL LOOP
 --
 -- Get the name of the detail block
 --
 curblk := Get_Relation_Property(currel, DETAIL_NAME);
 --
 -- If this block has changes, return its name
 --
 IF ( Get_Block_Property(curblk, STATUS) = 'CHANGED' ) THEN
 RETURN curblk;
 ELSE
 --
 -- No changes, recursively look for changed blocks below
 --
 retblk := First_Changed_Block_Below(curblk);
 --
 -- If some block below is changed, return its name
 --
 IF retblk IS NOT NULL THEN
 RETURN retblk;
 ELSE
 --
 -- Consider the next relation
 --
 currel := Get_Relation_Property(currel, NEXT_MASTER_RELATION);
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END LOOP;

 --
 -- No changed blocks were found
 --
 RETURN NULL;
 END First_Changed_Block_Below;

BEGIN
 --
 -- Init Local Vars
 --
 mastblk := :System.Master_Block;
 coordop := :System.Coordination_Operation;
 trigblk := :System.Trigger_Block;
 startitm := :System.Cursor_Item;
 frmstat := :System.Form_Status;

 --
 -- If the coordination operation is anything but CLEAR_RECORD or
 -- SYNCHRONIZE_BLOCKS, then continue checking.
 --
 IF coordop NOT IN ('CLEAR_RECORD', 'SYNCHRONIZE_BLOCKS') THEN
 --
 -- If we're processing the driving master block...
 --
 IF mastblk = trigblk THEN
 --
 -- If something in the form is changed, find the
 -- first changed block below the master
 --
 IF frmstat = 'CHANGED' THEN
 curblk := First_Changed_Block_Below(mastblk);
 --
 -- If we find a changed block below, go there
 -- and Ask to commit the changes.
 --
 IF curblk IS NOT NULL THEN
 Go_Block(curblk);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 Clear_Block(ASK_COMMIT);
 --
 -- If user cancels commit dialog, raise error
 --
 IF NOT ( :System.Form_Status = 'QUERY'
 OR :System.Block_Status = 'NEW' ) THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;

 --
 -- Clear all the detail blocks for this master without
 -- any further asking to commit.
 --
 currel := Get_Block_Property(trigblk, FIRST_MASTER_RELATION);
 WHILE currel IS NOT NULL LOOP
 curdtl := Get_Relation_Property(currel, DETAIL_NAME);
 IF Get_Block_Property(curdtl, STATUS) <> 'NEW' THEN
 Go_Block(curdtl);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 Clear_Block(NO_VALIDATE);
 IF :System.Block_Status <> 'NEW' THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 currel := Get_Relation_Property(currel, NEXT_MASTER_RELATION);
 END LOOP;

 --
 -- Put cursor back where it started
 --
 IF :System.Cursor_Item <> startitm THEN
 Go_Item(startitm);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 END IF;

EXCEPTION
 WHEN Form_Trigger_Failure THEN
 IF :System.Cursor_Item <> startitm THEN
 Go_Item(startitm);
 END IF;
 RAISE;

END Clear_All_Master_Details;

ProgramUnit.Name: ATVI_AUDIT_TRAIL
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE ATVI_AUDIT_TRAIL IS
/* Central New Mexico Community College AUDIT TRAIL
CNMCCWR#2659 AMueller 16-JAN-2008
 1. Cloned PZAEMPL from PEAEMPL release 7.2.4, which was delivered with the
 2007/2008 year-end payroll upgrade.
 2. Hid all of the "Leave of Absence" frame items into the <null> canvas.
 3. Created new data block PZBEMPL and placed items into the "Leave of Absence"
 frame as "CNM Employee Information". Users should not be able to insert records
 into this data block unless there is no record for the given PIDM yet.
 4. Hid all of the "Hiring Location" frame items into the <null> canvas.
 5. Created new data block PEVJOBS and placed items into the "Hiring Location"
 frame as "CNM Job Information". This is a display only block containing multiple
 records; a scrollbar was added to facilitate scrolling through those records.
 6. Changed the PEBEMPL.KEY-NXTBLK and PEBEMPL.KEY-PRVBLK trigger
 to incorporate the two new data blocks into the block sequence. Also added
 PZBEMPL.KEY-PRVBLK and PEVJOBS.KEY-NXTBLK triggers to facilitate smooth
 navigation between data blocks and tabs.
END AUDIT TRAIL
*/
BEGIN
 NULL;
END;

Trigger.Name: MNU_OPT_WIN_FACULTY
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :GOVT_IND = 'G' OR :GOVT_IND = 'C' THEN
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER('INVALID_FUNCTION_MSG');
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE;

Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 APPROVALS_IND VARCHAR2(1);
 NBRJOBS_FUTURE_CHG_IND VARCHAR2(1);
 CURSOR SEL_NTRINST IS 
 SELECT NTRINST_APPROVALS_IND, NTRINST_NBRJOBS_FUTURE_CHG_IND 
 FROM NTRINST;


BEGIN
 OPEN SEL_NTRINST;
 FETCH SEL_NTRINST INTO APPROVALS_IND, NBRJOBS_FUTURE_CHG_IND;
 IF SEL_NTRINST%NOTFOUND THEN 
 MESSAGE ( G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0019', 'FORM','*ERROR* NTRINST record not found; Cannot continue.') );
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE; 
 END IF;
 CLOSE SEL_NTRINST;
 :GLOBAL.APPROVALS_IND := APPROVALS_IND;
 :GLOBAL.NBRJOBS_FUTURE_CHG_IND := NBRJOBS_FUTURE_CHG_IND;
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 ITEM_ID ITEM;
 AL_BUT NUMBER;
BEGIN
IF INSTR(:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM,'ROLLBACK') > 0 THEN
 DO_KEY ('CLEAR_FORM');
ELSIF INSTR(:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM,'SAVE') > 0 THEN
 DO_KEY ('COMMIT_FORM');
ELSIF INSTR(:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM,'EXITVALUE') > 0 THEN
 DO_KEY ('NEXT_KEY');
ELSIF INSTR(:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM,'EXIT') > 0 THEN
 DO_KEY('EXIT_FORM');
ELSIF INSTR(:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM,'ENTQRY') > 0 THEN
 DO_KEY('ENTER_QUERY');
ELSIF INSTR(:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM,'EXEQRY') > 0 THEN
 DO_KEY('EXECUTE_QUERY');
ELSIF INSTR(:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM,'_LBT') > 0 THEN 
 ITEM_ID := FIND_ITEM(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK')||
 SUBSTR(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM'),
 INSTR(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM'),'.'),
 INSTR(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM'),'_LBT')-1 -
 INSTR(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM'),'.')+1));
 IF ID_NULL(ITEM_ID) THEN
 MESSAGE( G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0029', 'FORM','LOV button is outside the current block') );
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF;
------------ Code added for one button lov on COAS and ORGN fields ------------
 IF (INSTR(:SYSTEM.CURRENT_ITEM,'PEBEMPL_COAS_CODE_DIST') > 0 AND
 INSTR(:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM,'PEBEMPL_COAS_CODE_HOME_LBT') > 0) 
 THEN NULL ;
 ELSIF (INSTR(:SYSTEM.CURRENT_ITEM,'PEBEMPL_ORGN_CODE_DIST') > 0 AND
 INSTR(:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM,'PEBEMPL_ORGN_CODE_HOME_LBT') > 0)
 THEN NULL ;
 ELSIF (INSTR(:SYSTEM.CURRENT_ITEM,'PEBEMPL_COAS_CODE_DIST') > 0 AND
 INSTR(:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM,'PEBEMPL_ORGN_CODE_HOME_LBT') > 0) 
 THEN GO_ITEM('PEBEMPL_ORGN_CODE_DIST') ;
 ELSIF (INSTR(:SYSTEM.CURRENT_ITEM,'PEBEMPL_ORGN_CODE_DIST') > 0 AND
 INSTR(:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM,'PEBEMPL_COAS_CODE_HOME_LBT') > 0)
 THEN GO_ITEM('PEBEMPL_COAS_CODE_DIST') ;
 ELSE
-------- End of code added for one button lov on COAS and ORGN fields ---------
 GO_ITEM(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK')||
 SUBSTR(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM'),
 INSTR(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM'),'.'),
 INSTR(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM'),'_LBT')-1 -
 INSTR(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM'),'.')+1));
 END IF;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE; 
 DO_KEY('LIST_VALUES');
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE; 
END IF; 
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN_NEW_BLOCK_INSTANCE_TRG
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 FIELD_NAME VARCHAR2(60);
BEGIN
 IF :SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK <> 'KEY_BLOCK' THEN
 FIELD_NAME := :SYSTEM.CURSOR_ITEM ;
 IF :CHECK_KEYS = 'Y' THEN
 :CHECK_KEYS := 'N';
--
-- SET_FORM_PROPERTY(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM'),VALIDATION,PROPERTY_OFF);
 GO_BLOCK('KEY_BLOCK');
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE;
--
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'CHECK_KEYS' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;

--
 NEXT_BLOCK ;
 CLEAR_RECORD ;
 IF :GLOBAL.APPLY = 'Y' THEN
 :SYSTEM.MESSAGE_LEVEL := 5;
 END IF;
 EXECUTE_QUERY ; 
 :SYSTEM.MESSAGE_LEVEL := 0;

-- SET_FORM_PROPERTY(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM'),VALIDATION,PROPERTY_ON);
-- 
 IF SELECT_PTRINST_10 THEN
 IF NOT f_employee_exists(:key_block.pidm) THEN
 :PEBEMPL_I9_FORM_IND := 'N' ;
 END IF ;
 END IF ;
--
 :CHECK_KEYS := 'N';
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER('DISABLE_KEYS');
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'ENABLE_BTNS' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER('ENABLE_PAGES');
--
 GO_ITEM(FIELD_NAME);
 END IF;
 END IF ;
--
-- Electronic Approvals Code --
IF :GLOBAL.APPLY = 'Y' THEN
 APPROVALS ('NEW_BLOCK_INST');
END IF;
END;

Trigger.Name: N$_GUROPTM_CALL_FORM
Trigger.TriggerText:
/* This trigger will call a form specified in the GUROPTM table. It uses the logic from 
 G$_secured_form_call to check security. */
 
DECLARE 

FORM_TO_CALL VARCHAR2 (30);
TYPE_IND VARCHAR2(1);
CAPACITY VARCHAR2(1);
CURRENT_FORM VARCHAR2(10);
USER_NAME VARCHAR2(30);

CURSOR GET_CAPACITY IS
SELECT GUROPTM_CAPACITY
FROM GUROPTM
WHERE GUROPTM_FORM_NAME = CURRENT_FORM
AND GUROPTM_NAME1 = FORM_TO_CALL
AND GUROPTM_TYPE_IND = TYPE_IND;

/* GOT_PERMISSION CHAR(1);


CURSOR SECURITY_CURSOR IS
 SELECT GURSECR_CAPACITY_IND
 FROM GURSECR
 WHERE GURSECR_TYPE_IND = 'F'
 AND GURSECR_PROCESS_NAME = FORM_TO_CALL
 AND (GURSECR_USER_NAME = USER_NAME
 OR GURSECR_USER_NAME = 'PUBLIC')
 ORDER BY DECODE(GURSECR_USER_NAME, 'PUBLIC', 2, 1) ; */

BEGIN
 CURRENT_FORM := GET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY (CURRENT_FORM_NAME);
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER ('SAVE_KEYS');
 FORM_TO_CALL:= :GLOBAL.GUROPTM_NAME1;
 TYPE_IND := :GLOBAL.GUROPTM_TYPE_IND;
 USER_NAME := :GLOBAL.CURRENT_USER;

/* IF :GLOBAL.SECRSYS = 'Y' THEN
 OPEN SECURITY_CURSOR ;
 FETCH SECURITY_CURSOR INTO GOT_PERMISSION ;
 END IF; */

 OPEN GET_CAPACITY;
 FETCH GET_CAPACITY INTO CAPACITY;
/* IF GOT_PERMISSION = 'Q' AND :GLOBAL.SECRSYS = 'Y' THEN 
 G$_SECURED_FORM_CALL(:GLOBAL.CURRENT_USER,FORM_TO_CALL,'QUERY');
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 ELSIF GOT_PERMISSION NOT IN ('Q','M') AND :GLOBAL.SECRSYS = 'Y' THEN 
 MESSAGE('*ERROR* User does not have permission for requested form' ) ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE; */
 IF CAPACITY = 'Q' THEN 
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER('G$_REVOKE_ACCESS');
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 G$_SECURED_FORM_CALL(:GLOBAL.CURRENT_USER,FORM_TO_CALL,'QUERY');
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 ELSE 
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER('G$_REVOKE_ACCESS');
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 G$_SECURED_FORM_CALL(:GLOBAL.CURRENT_USER,FORM_TO_CALL,'');
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 END IF;
END;

 , TRUE);

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-FORM-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE

PIDM NUMBER;
FORM_NAME VARCHAR2(7);

BEGIN
--
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'LOAD_FORM_HEADER' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'GLOBAL_COPY' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'DISABLE_BTNS' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'GET_NTRINST_INDS');
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER ('GET_LEAVE_METHOD');
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
--
 :GLOBAL.ACTION := '';
--
 G$_SET_INST_PROPERTY;
 G$_SET_WIN_PROPERTY;
 
 SHOW_VIEW('PEAEMPL_1_TAB_CANVAS');
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER('DISABLE_PAGES');
--
 IF :GLOBAL.FINSYS <> 'Y' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PEBEMPL_COAS_CODE_HOME_LBT',ENABLED,PROPERTY_OFF);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PEBEMPL_COAS_CODE_HOME',REQUIRED,PROPERTY_OFF);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PEBEMPL_COAS_CODE_HOME',ENABLED,PROPERTY_OFF);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PEBEMPL_COAS_CODE_HOME',QUERYABLE,PROPERTY_OFF);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PEBEMPL_COAS_CODE_DIST',REQUIRED,PROPERTY_OFF);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PEBEMPL_COAS_CODE_DIST',ENABLED,PROPERTY_OFF);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PEBEMPL_COAS_CODE_DIST',QUERYABLE,PROPERTY_OFF);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PEBEMPL_COAS_CODE_DIST_LBT',ENABLED,PROPERTY_OFF);
 END IF ;
--
-- Electronic Approvals Code --

IF :GLOBAL.APPROVALS_IND = 'Y' AND :GLOBAL.APPLY = 'Y' THEN
 START_APPROVALS;
ELSE 
 :GLOBAL.APPLY := 'N';
END IF;
:CALLED_FORM_IND := NVL(:GLOBAL.FORM_WAS_CALLED,'N');
IF :KEY_BLOCK.ID IS NOT NULL THEN
 N$_CALLED_FORM_NAVIGATE;
END IF ; 
END;

Trigger.Name: KEY-NXTBLK
Trigger.TriggerText:
NEXT_BLOCK ;
 EXECUTE_QUERY ;

Trigger.Name: KEY-CLRFRM
Trigger.TriggerText:
EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'CLRFRM_TRIGGER' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;

Trigger.Name: PRE-UPDATE
Trigger.TriggerText:
EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'UPDATE_ACTIVITY_DATE' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
--
 IF :GLOBAL.FINSYS = 'Y' THEN
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'EDIT_ORGN' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'EDIT_ORGN2' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 ELSE
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'EDIT_ORGN_HR' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'EDIT_ORGN2_HR' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;

Trigger.Name: PRE-INSERT
Trigger.TriggerText:
EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'UPDATE_ACTIVITY_DATE' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
--
 IF :GLOBAL.FINSYS = 'Y' THEN
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'EDIT_ORGN' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'EDIT_ORGN2' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 ELSE
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'EDIT_ORGN_HR' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'EDIT_ORGN2_HR' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;

Trigger.Name: PRE_FORM_TRG
Trigger.TriggerText:
DEFAULT_VALUE( '0', 'global.query_mode' ) ;
DEFAULT_VALUE( 'N', 'global.apply');
DECLARE
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT GUBINST_HIGHED_GOVT_IND
 FROM GUBINST;
BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO :GOVT_IND;
 CLOSE PTI_CURSOR;
END;

Trigger.Name: GET_LEAVE_METHOD
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 CURSOR ptrinst_c IS
 SELECT ptrinst_accrue_leave_method,
 ptrinst_revoke_ew2_consent_ind
 FROM PTRINST;
 
 lv_ptrinst_rec ptrinst%ROWTYPE;
BEGIN
 :LEAVE_METHOD := NULL;
 OPEN ptrinst_c;
 FETCH ptrinst_c INTO :LEAVE_METHOD, :REVOKE_EW2_CONSENT_IND;
 CLOSE ptrinst_c;
 --
 g$_check_value(:LEAVE_METHOD IS NULL, 
 G$_NLS.Get('PEAEMPL-0064', 'FORM','*ERROR* Leave Processing Method is not defined on PTRINST form.'),
 TRUE);
 g$_check_failure;
 --
 IF :LEAVE_METHOD = 'J' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PEBEMPL_LCAT_CODE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_OFF);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PEBEMPL_LCAT_CODE_LBT',ENABLED,PROPERTY_OFF);
 END IF;
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-TAB-PAGE-CHANGED
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
tp_nm VARCHAR2(30);
tp_id TAB_PAGE;
tp_lb VARCHAR2(30);
page_id TAB_PAGE;
BEGIN 
 tp_nm := GET_CANVAS_PROPERTY( 'PEAEMPL_1_TAB_CANVAS', topmost_tab_page );
 if tp_nm = 'PEBEMPL' then
 IF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PEBEMPL_EMPL_STATUS', VISIBLE) = 'TRUE' 
 AND GET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PEBEMPL_EMPL_STATUS', ENABLED) = 'TRUE' THEN
 GO_ITEM('PEBEMPL_EMPL_STATUS');
 ELSE
 GO_ITEM('PEBEMPL_ECLS_CODE'); 
 END IF ; 
 elsif tp_nm = 'FLSA' then
 GO_ITEM('PEBEMPL_FLSA_IND') ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE; 
 elsif tp_nm = 'STATS' then
 GO_ITEM('PEBEMPL_DAYS_IN_CANADA') ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE;
 end if;
END;

Trigger.Name: ENABLE_PAGES
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
page_id TAB_PAGE;
BEGIN
 page_id := FIND_TAB_PAGE('FLSA');
 IF GET_TAB_PAGE_PROPERTY( page_id, enabled ) = 'FALSE' THEN
 SET_TAB_PAGE_PROPERTY(page_id, enabled, property_true);
 END IF; 
 page_id := FIND_TAB_PAGE( 'STATS' );
 IF GET_TAB_PAGE_PROPERTY( page_id, enabled ) = 'FALSE' THEN
 SET_TAB_PAGE_PROPERTY( page_id, enabled, property_true );
 END IF;
END;

Trigger.Name: DISABLE_PAGES
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
page_id TAB_PAGE;
BEGIN
 page_id := FIND_TAB_PAGE('FLSA' );
 IF GET_TAB_PAGE_PROPERTY( page_id, enabled ) = 'TRUE' THEN
 SET_TAB_PAGE_PROPERTY( page_id, enabled, property_false );
 END IF; 
 page_id := FIND_TAB_PAGE( 'STATS' );
 IF GET_TAB_PAGE_PROPERTY( page_id, enabled ) = 'TRUE' THEN
 SET_TAB_PAGE_PROPERTY( page_id, enabled, property_false );
 END IF;
 
END;

 Clear_All_Master_Details;
END;
